17f696e0685l0i0nblzy58h0qvewk.name: All-knowing Greaves
17f696e0685l0i0nblzy58h0qvewk.description: Greaves set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.

17f69515b49l0i0nbno079cqzlskebf.name: All-knowing Armor
17f69515b49l0i0nbno079cqzlskebf.description: Armor set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.

17f69751613l0i0nbp9nsdqjza4rxf.name: All-knowing Helm
17f69751613l0i0nbp9nsdqjza4rxf.description: Helm set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.

17f696221c3l0i0nbrxr4gcdi7uag.name: Alberich's Robe (altered)
17f696221c3l0i0nbrxr4gcdi7uag.description: Lighter version of the Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.

17f69b8efedl0i0nbtfdfkxtl7iqc.name: All-knowing Armor (altered)
17f69b8efedl0i0nbtfdfkxtl7iqc.description: Lighter version of the All-knowing Armor.

17f69623cf1l0i0nbutr05ucarsvt.name: Aristocrat Coat
17f69623cf1l0i0nbutr05ucarsvt.description: Tanned leather coat adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

17f692d6b5al0i0nbvb3a2bhklmel9.name: Aristocrat Garb
17f692d6b5al0i0nbvb3a2bhklmel9.description: High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

17f697ac6cal0i0nbwibax7uqbwu4d.name: Aristocrat Garb (altered)
17f697ac6cal0i0nbwibax7uqbwu4d.description: Lighter version of the Aristocrat Garb.

17f6984f152l0i0nc38cztqhxqc6rw.name: All-knowing Gauntlets
17f6984f152l0i0nc38cztqhxqc6rw.description: Gauntlets set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.

17f694ffd2el0i0ndf0zrwzni9hv1.name: Azur's Glintstone Robe
17f694ffd2el0i0ndf0zrwzni9hv1.description: A robe reserved for grant masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Corroded by blue-green glintstones.

17f69965516l0i0ndhqx8pi2kbhe8d.name: Battlemage Robe
17f69965516l0i0ndhqx8pi2kbhe8d.description: Robe worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy scholar, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

17f69ba0a8al0i0ndi7y4hl33hny4.name: Banished Knight Armor (altered)
17f69ba0a8al0i0ndi7y4hl33hny4.description: Lighter version of the Banished Knight Armor.

17f696dc24el0i0ndj4er6v25jkwqd.name: Astrologer Robe
17f696dc24el0i0ndj4er6v25jkwqd.description: Robe fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.

17f694e487fl0i0ndlkf15nkhfpgah.name: Astrologer Robe (altered)
17f694e487fl0i0ndlkf15nkhfpgah.description: Lighter version of the Astrologer Robe

17f694178c9l0i0ndn4e10pcg63tee.name: Beast Champion Armor
17f694178c9l0i0ndn4e10pcg63tee.description: Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant. Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was. Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.

17f696d739fl0i0ndpwqkk3g89lpk.name: Black Knife Armor
17f696d739fl0i0ndpwqkk3g89lpk.description: Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound. Traces of power yet remain in its concealing veil, which muffles the sound of footsteps. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

17f69391b3bl0i0ndt4c0it6kwlyag.name: Beast Champion Armor (altered)
17f69391b3bl0i0ndt4c0it6kwlyag.description: Lighter version of the  Best Champion Armor

17f6935585fl0i0ne8s2gcl84asvoi.name: Banished Knight Armor
17f6935585fl0i0ne8s2gcl84asvoi.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.

17f6937143al0i0neejcyw9x5dlcff.name: Black Knife Armor (altered)
17f6937143al0i0neejcyw9x5dlcff.description: Lighter version of the Black Knife Armor

17f694aa574l0i0nfrfjfovdfsmoob.name: Bloodsoaked Tabard
17f694aa574l0i0nfrfjfovdfsmoob.description: Padded cloth armor with indelible bloodstains around the neck. Worn by headless foot soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

17f6930b5f4l0i0nfs4e48erx5y37e.name: Bloodhound Knight Armor (altered)
17f6930b5f4l0i0nfs4e48erx5y37e.description: Lighter version of the Bloodhound Knight Armor

17f695d4d39l0i0nfv30z1i34pnvzqf.name: Blaidd's Armor (altered)
17f695d4d39l0i0nfv30z1i34pnvzqf.description: Lighter version of the Blaidd's Armor

17f69756830l0i0nfv30b2rsq1b3p5.name: Bloodhound Knight Armor
17f69756830l0i0nfv30b2rsq1b3p5.description: Metal armor with a jutting breastplate.  Worn by the Bloodhound Knights.

17f6978a0d3l0i0nfv5cv59797t18.name: Blackflame Monk Armor
17f6978a0d3l0i0nfv5cv59797t18.description: Black iron armor adorned with ashen cloth.

17f6960eae6l0i0nfy8iinlzz27.name: Blaidd's Armor
17f6960eae6l0i0nfy8iinlzz27.description: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf Blaidd

17f69b8ac34l0i0ng1cl9m395exm9.name: Blue Silver Mail Armor (altered)
17f69b8ac34l0i0ng1cl9m395exm9.description: Lighter version of the Blue Silver Mail Armor

17f697cd43al0i0ng1v05yt93pykiy.name: Blue Festive Garb
17f697cd43al0i0ng1v05yt93pykiy.description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Use of this garb, dyed in a stunning blue, is only permitted for the young maids who play the central role in the festival.

17f692f8268l0i0ng2x7ww9rwst8uv.name: Blue Cloth Vest
17f692f8268l0i0ng2x7ww9rwst8uv.description: Vest of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer. Just as still waters turn foul, stagnation leads to decay. Warriors must remain ever drifting.

17f69470de4l0i0ng3qcwe0r963svq.name: Blue Silver Mail Armor
17f69470de4l0i0ng3qcwe0r963svq.description: Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers. Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.

17f69afe5b2l0i0nhch0j37nxu532xb.name: Brave's Battlewear
17f69afe5b2l0i0nhch0j37nxu532xb.description: Battlewear fashioned from leather armor adorned with a large sheet of cloth. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands The red cloth signifies participation in the Long March long, long ago and this ceremonial garb beseeches the favor of the Warrior King who led them.

17f69a0b826l0i0nhemarkphpvbzxt.name: Briar Armor (altered)
17f69a0b826l0i0nhemarkphpvbzxt.description: Lighter version of the Briar Armor

17f6971b296l0i0nhfp8qwuekeaesn.name: Carian Knight Armor
17f6971b296l0i0nhfp8qwuekeaesn.description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

17f69bd3117l0i0nhi5aujkgurxk7s.name: Briar Armor
17f69bd3117l0i0nhi5aujkgurxk7s.description: Battered iron armor from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar.

17f697f035fl0i0nhj9wfzbt4cchj.name: Carian Knight Armor (altered)
17f697f035fl0i0nhj9wfzbt4cchj.description: Lighter version of the Carian Knight Armor

17f6997525al0i0nhjhufowjmfwto.name: Brave's Battlewear (altered)
17f6997525al0i0nhjhufowjmfwto.description: Lighter version of the Brave's Battlewear

17f69a89e68l0i0nhk83o7u0bpk91k.name: Chain Armor
17f69a89e68l0i0nhk83o7u0bpk91k.description: Armor made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.

17f69aac7del0i0nhkvop92drjzgq.name: Champion Pauldron
17f69aac7del0i0nhkvop92drjzgq.description: Pauldron reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.

17f69a8a3f0l0i0nhqn02vvk1xgq65q.name: Bull-goat Armor
17f69a8a3f0l0i0nhqn02vvk1xgq65q.description: Great Horned Tragoth's armor. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise.

17f69396920l0i0nhqr4mk5q440elb.name: Chain-draped Tabard
17f69396920l0i0nhqr4mk5q440elb.description: Padded cloth armor with a chainmail shawl draped over the shoulders. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f69be686fl0i0nizg2fcjv8u31em.name: Cloth Garb
17f69be686fl0i0nizg2fcjv8u31em.description: Clothing made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.

17f69aaa630l0i0nj3bpfc2hdtz6bd.name: Cleanrot Armor (altered)
17f69aaa630l0i0nj3bpfc2hdtz6bd.description: Lighter version of the Cleanrot Armor

17f69b1dc9cl0i0nj8l9fmv72bzrsi.name: Commoner's Garb (altered)
17f69b1dc9cl0i0nj8l9fmv72bzrsi.description: Lighter version of the Commoner's Garb

17f69574f29l0i0nj8lj0vaeprdgq.name: Cleanrot Armor
17f69574f29l0i0nj8lj0vaeprdgq.description: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering. The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

17f69bf382el0i0njdautt61bo7uj.name: Commoner's Garb
17f69bf382el0i0njdautt61bo7uj.description: Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.

17f69804d5fl0i0njgjdpbczm2va3d.name: Confessor Armor (altered)
17f69804d5fl0i0njgjdpbczm2va3d.description: Lighter version of the Confessor Armor

17f69854218l0i0njgqjqpsw5xkvfa.name: Confessor Armor
17f69854218l0i0njgqjqpsw5xkvfa.description: Black leather armor for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.

17f695d1369l0i0njkocj642d4zzl.name: Commoner's Simple Garb
17f695d1369l0i0njkocj642d4zzl.description: Garb with a modest cloth cape attached. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.

17f69ac8a94l0i0njlvxak0kr6y9r.name: Commoner's Simple Garb (altered)
17f69ac8a94l0i0njlvxak0kr6y9r.description: Lighter version of the Commoner's Simple Garb

17f694d25a9l0i0njnlc9axlanhtan.name: Consort's Robe
17f694d25a9l0i0njnlc9axlanhtan.description: Fine robe of white silk worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor.

17f69c07710l0i0nkbcxuu9u5cmd9.name: Crucible Axe Armor
17f69c07710l0i0nkbcxuu9u5cmd9.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Ordovis and his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.

17f69bd8054l0i0nkxr3clw4f1za97.name: Corhyn's Robe
17f69bd8054l0i0nkxr3clw4f1za97.description: Robe of Corhyn the cleric. Even after exile, Corhyn refused to recant his prophecies. And for this, he was blessed with the guidance of grace. Since then, the cart wheel draped on his neck has served as a reminder. That true guidance awaits those with iron wills. Those with unwavering faith.

17f694aeec6l0i0nlb2yczejblw3fs.name: Crucible Tree Armor
17f694aeec6l0i0nlb2yczejblw3fs.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Siluria and her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.

17f6977b703l0i0nlg5t37m2ncrcgg.name: Crucible Axe Armor (altered)
17f6977b703l0i0nlg5t37m2ncrcgg.description: Lighter version of the Crucible Axe Armor

17f6962d71bl0i0nlgnf87vzelcqvb.name: Crucible Tree Armor (altered)
17f6962d71bl0i0nlgnf87vzelcqvb.description: Lighter version of the Crucible Tree Armor

17f696e2a6el0i0nlhjp412cuyw1b.name: Cuckoo Surcoat
17f696e2a6el0i0nlhjp412cuyw1b.description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. The surcoat depicts twinned cuckoos peering into a flourishing mass of glintstone. To a glintstone sorcerer, the body is a transient thing. The Cuckoo alone knows its insignificance, yet watches over it all the same.

17f69ad695cl0i0nlk7zosw17m45i.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor
17f69ad695cl0i0nlk7zosw17m45i.description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.

17f69924cd5l0i0nlqxpvm0jwhqpqq.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor (altered)
17f69924cd5l0i0nlqxpvm0jwhqpqq.description: Lighter version of the Cuckoo Knight Armor

17f693e9142l0i0nlr04j56c87ebi7.name: Deathbed Dress
17f693e9142l0i0nlr04j56c87ebi7.description: Extremely thin and sheer white dress worn by the Deathbed Companion as she embraces the dead. Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer. The touch of the fabric is exceedingly soft, so as not to harm even the most withered corpse, while still sharing her warmth.

17f69862df3l0i0nlxyv0dkfqf5tj.name: Depraved Perfumer Robe
17f69862df3l0i0nlxyv0dkfqf5tj.description: Robe worn by depraved perfumers. The embroidery on the apron is itself a curse upon the Erdtree. These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is  what earned them their name.

17f696d7404l0i0nn7va4d6abbcotb.name: Drake Knight Armor
17f696d7404l0i0nn7va4d6abbcotb.description: Black iron armor worn by drake knights. Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partake of communion. The cape is crafted with dragon wing membrane.

17f699b9043l0i0nn83d0h57urk7fk.name: Drake Knight Armor (altered)
17f699b9043l0i0nn83d0h57urk7fk.description: Lighter version of the Drake Knight Armor

17f69909573l0i0nn85bvv7mliw69r.name: Depraved Perfumer Robe (altered)
17f69909573l0i0nn85bvv7mliw69r.description: Lighter version of the Depraved Perfumer Robe

17f6973b5c4l0i0nnb11yezcgr5rfzi.name: Elden Lord Armor (altered)
17f6973b5c4l0i0nnb11yezcgr5rfzi.description: Lighter version of the Elden Lord Armor

17f693e09b8l0i0nndffutsb6b4e8k.name: Elden Lord Armor
17f693e09b8l0i0nndffutsb6b4e8k.description: Armor of Godfrey the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.

17f699fe52el0i0nne4l5nr3ut897n.name: Dirty Chainmail
17f699fe52el0i0nne4l5nr3ut897n.description: Chainmail worn by young Albinaurics. The appearance of a protruding belly provides no benefits worthy of note.

17f69798ccbl0i0nnfvcte1t2jfs1b.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
17f69798ccbl0i0nnfvcte1t2jfs1b.description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth. Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold. A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.

17f6990e711l0i0nnhe1vsvmoy5cxi.name: Erdtree Surcoat
17f6990e711l0i0nnhe1vsvmoy5cxi.description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. The surcoat bears a majestic likeness of the Erdtree. Its golden backing is an honor bestowed on no other soldiers.

17f693c8f84l0i0nnir4iotp5rvfb3.name: Eccentric's Armor
17f693c8f84l0i0nnir4iotp5rvfb3.description: Unusually colorful armor. Worn by the knight Jerren. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as guest of the Carian royals, he became a guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath

17f69b9d0d3l0i0np1ewinq79w2phd.name: Festive Garb
17f69b9d0d3l0i0np1ewinq79w2phd.description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Faintly bloodstained.

17f69809c2cl0i0np1gybgyzscj0p.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe (altered)
17f69809c2cl0i0np1gybgyzscj0p.description: Lighter version of the Errant Sorcerer Robe.

17f692d489al0i0np20nfmvw8ku9t.name: Festive Garb (altered)
17f692d489al0i0np20nfmvw8ku9t.description: Lighter version of the  Festive Garb.

17f69bcba02l0i0np2hg16z35gtvl.name: Fia's Robe
17f69bcba02l0i0np2hg16z35gtvl.description: Robe of black cloth that covers the entire body. Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.

17f69745003l0i0np2q18wxhgem49z.name: Fell Omen Cloak
17f69745003l0i0np2q18wxhgem49z.description: "A cloak of ragged fur worn about the exposed body of Margit, the Fell Omen.

17f6947679al0i0np87exprtde60f.name: Exile Armor
17f6947679al0i0np87exprtde60f.description: Damaged armor draped with a large deep-red cloth. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.

17f697bc348l0i0npao8lh55tj2dwt.name: Finger Maiden Robe (altered)
17f697bc348l0i0npao8lh55tj2dwt.description: Lighter version of the Finger Maiden Robe.

17f69a076eel0i0npawdixarnezf9r.name: Finger Maiden Robe
17f69a076eel0i0npawdixarnezf9r.description: Robe worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers.

17f69b6df92l0i0npbev39ka5gaueh.name: Fingerprint Armor
17f69b6df92l0i0npbev39ka5gaueh.description: Iron armor singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

17f692e48a9l0i0nq4invtcj4xoxg.name: Fingerprint Armor (altered)
17f692e48a9l0i0nq4invtcj4xoxg.description: Lighter version of the Fingerprint Armor.

17f69aaaa13l0i0nqk3jcpdpwb00yg.name: Fur Raiment
17f69aaaa13l0i0nqk3jcpdpwb00yg.description: Raiment fashioned from a bristly pelt. Worn by ancestral follower warriors. The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.

17f695e41e2l0i0nqlnzqhrds6de4.name: Gelmir Knight Armor
17f695e41e2l0i0nqlnzqhrds6de4.description: Armor worn by knights once royal to Praector Rykard.

17f69ac51bfl0i0nqnn5hwqbyhej9f.name: Gelmir Knight Armor (altered)
17f69ac51bfl0i0nqnn5hwqbyhej9f.description: Lighter version of the Gelmir Knight Armor.

17f698fce7fl0i0nqodwfje5g7qdem.name: Fire Prelate Armor
17f698fce7fl0i0nqodwfje5g7qdem.description: Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.

17f69ad1925l0i0nqpxhwptd5dkycf.name: Godrick Knight Armor
17f69ad1925l0i0nqpxhwptd5dkycf.description: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick The Grafted.

17f697838dbl0i0nqpyyrpkl1polw.name: Godksin Noble Robe
17f697838dbl0i0nqpyyrpkl1polw.description: Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles known for their seven-face aprons. Strengthens the Noble Presence incantation. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

17f6983f317l0i0nqr76b932gq1eoj.name: Fire Prelate Armor (altered)
17f6983f317l0i0nqr76b932gq1eoj.description: Lighter version of the Fire Prelate Armor.

17f693c5636l0i0nqs80ibau41zw46.name: Foot Soldier Tabard
17f693c5636l0i0nqs80ibau41zw46.description: Padded cloth armor with more than a few stains. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f69708cd7l0i0nqs88hzvrpj80p7.name: Fire Monk Armor
17f69708cd7l0i0nqs88hzvrpj80p7.description: Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth. Attire of the Fire Monks.

17f6975d8a6l0i0nr44oj398jnk4qd.name: Godrick Knight Armor (altered)
17f6975d8a6l0i0nr44oj398jnk4qd.description: Lighter version of the Godric Knight Armor.

17f69843734l0i0nrk3pzlcqfpqsj.name: Goldmask's Rags
17f69843734l0i0nrk3pzlcqfpqsj.description: Worn rags that just barely cover the body. Lord Goldmask felt no draw to the vain excess of clothing; what use is finery to one who seeks greater brilliance?

17f6936f1b2l0i0nrszrfarx7jjsn.name: Gravekeeper Cloak
17f6936f1b2l0i0nrszrfarx7jjsn.description: Defensive wear encircled by bronze snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.

17f69587918l0i0nrw5hhe7jpirj1l.name: Godskin Apostle Robe
17f69587918l0i0nrw5hhe7jpirj1l.description: Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.

17f697b1dc8l0i0nrz9dme9tiyu7a.name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
17f697b1dc8l0i0nrz9dme9tiyu7a.description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. The surcoat bears the crest of the Haligtree. Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.

17f69543723l0i0nrzqwqnk37jx86q.name: Gravekeeper Cloak (altered)
17f69543723l0i0nrzqwqnk37jx86q.description: Lighter version of the Gravekeeper Cloak.

17f69816a34l0i0ns0d76sqqs8yds9.name: Guardian Garb
17f69816a34l0i0ns0d76sqqs8yds9.description: Engraved golden garb. Worn by guardians of the Minor Erdtree.

17f693542bdl0i0ns0zp2tfb88ycs8.name: Haligtree Knight Armor
17f693542bdl0i0ns0zp2tfb88ycs8.description: Armor worn by knights sworn the Haligtree.

17f69862c2dl0i0ns8mbesz9lp03d.name: Guardian Garb (full Bloom)
17f69862c2dl0i0ns8mbesz9lp03d.description: Engraved golden garb. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees. Raises the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but greatly lowers fire damage negation. It is said that the blood-red flowers blooming on their backs mark the senescence of their ancient pact. Perhaps the guardians are part tree already

17f69929f49l0i0ns9wsqy4m97c0fp.name: Haligtree Knight Armor (altered)
17f69929f49l0i0ns9wsqy4m97c0fp.description: Lighter version of the Haligtree Knight Armor.

17f697006efl0i0nsgci74miib1qwe.name: High Page Clothes
17f697006efl0i0nsgci74miib1qwe.description: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.

17f69317737l0i0nt25yag7pvs80be.name: Highwayman Cloth Armor
17f69317737l0i0nt25yag7pvs80be.description: Hideously stained and ragged cloth armor. Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

17f6982714el0i0nt70cm2pr5h4jhe.name: High Page Clothes (altered)
17f6982714el0i0nt70cm2pr5h4jhe.description: Lighter version of the High Page Clothes.

17f69abd677l0i0ntbpaq2bpd1xvtv.name: Hoslow's Armor
17f69abd677l0i0ntbpaq2bpd1xvtv.description: Garish silver armor decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family. When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused. "I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."

17f69a7b122l0i0ntcckeer2ct3dv.name: Ivory-draped Tabard
17f69a7b122l0i0ntcckeer2ct3dv.description: Padded cloth armor with a shawl in the color of ivory draped over the shoulders. Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.

17f69503212l0i0nte4011gmp66g3jz.name: Knight Armor
17f69503212l0i0nte4011gmp66g3jz.description: Iron armor of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

17f69a4d9f6l0i0ntecg0c1cz59ipm.name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
17f69a4d9f6l0i0ntecg0c1cz59ipm.description: Robe worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.

17f698879e4l0i0ntflgv6ht3fsl6t.name: Land Of Reeds Armor
17f698879e4l0i0ntflgv6ht3fsl6t.description: Armor made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to blood-soaked madness, or so it is said.

17f699aeee7l0i0nthxam2x800a5c.name: Hoslow's Armor (altered)
17f699aeee7l0i0nthxam2x800a5c.description: Lighter version of the Hoslow's Armor.

17f695ed415l0i0ntif92akzx0ovmm.name: Lazuli Robe
17f695ed415l0i0ntif92akzx0ovmm.description: Robe worn by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus, singular among the greater Raya Lucaria Academy. These scholars, who sought to master Carian sorcery, instead learned to see the moon as equal to the stars. This robe, in the hue of the full moon, signifies their heresy.

17f69894502l0i0ntxkt2y5dhjdl7p.name: Leather Armor
17f69894502l0i0ntxkt2y5dhjdl7p.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather armor worn by a savvy soldier.

17f69b3d13al0i0nugmba2ouxg19qb.name: Leather-draped Tabard
17f69b3d13al0i0nugmba2ouxg19qb.description: Padded cloth armor with a leather shawl draped over the shoulders.

17f69b0d53fl0i0nujjyrjjg524xor.name: Lionel's Armor (altered)
17f69b0d53fl0i0nujjyrjjg524xor.description: Lighter version of the Lionel's Armor.

17f6970f215l0i0nujl52kn31cm8jm.name: Leyndell Knight Armor (altered)
17f6970f215l0i0nujl52kn31cm8jm.description: Lighter version of the Leyndell Knight Armor.

17f69b968e9l0i0nuk291h2knlgiqv.name: Leyndell Knight Armor
17f69b968e9l0i0nuk291h2knlgiqv.description: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Its left breast is emblazoned with a symbol of Erdtree Worship, said to have once been imbued with an incantation of protection.

17f69669128l0i0nuklvpxe21yb3kp.name: Lionel's Armor
17f69669128l0i0nuklvpxe21yb3kp.description: Round iron armor with a banner extending from its back. Worn by the Lionel the Lionhearted.

17f69b02356l0i0nul0mkz8nbq4rqj.name: Lord Of Blood's Robe
17f69b02356l0i0nul0mkz8nbq4rqj.description: Attire of Mohg, Lord of Blood, embroidered with an extravagant gold emblem on black cloth. The dress of a Luminary, the reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.

17f699d7041l0i0nuo8w22499tgoyc.name: Lusat's Robe
17f699d7041l0i0nuo8w22499tgoyc.description: A robe reserved for grand masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Corroded by blue glintstones.

17f69481421l0i0nuqgwo0cwsq8vc.name: Lord Of Blood's Robe (altered)
17f69481421l0i0nuqgwo0cwsq8vc.description: Lighter version of the Lord Of Blood's Robe.

17f69b03743l0i0nuwvwgkt75di5k.name: Malenia's Armor
17f69b03743l0i0nuwvwgkt75di5k.description: Armor made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god - he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

17f69473afal0i0nvo58tuankei4se.name: Maliketh's Armor (altered)
17f69473afal0i0nvo58tuankei4se.description: Lighter version of the Maliketh's Armor.

17f69997c07l0i0nvphxr9fuflcj2r.name: Malenia's Armor (altered)
17f69997c07l0i0nvphxr9fuflcj2r.description: Lighter version of the Maleinia's Armor.

17f69a9d818l0i0nvqxy32740gd00f.name: Malformed Dragon Armor
17f69a9d818l0i0nvqxy32740gd00f.description: Malformed golden armor. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels. After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.

17f69afddc1l0i0nvr2mcm4to2vap8.name: Maliketh's Armor
17f69afddc1l0i0nvr2mcm4to2vap8.description: Beast's armor made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.

17f69b230edl0i0nvref9qs0csu7c.name: Marionette Soldier Armor
17f69b230edl0i0nvref9qs0csu7c.description: Armor of metal bands arranged in a lattice. Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers. The construction of this armor is remarkably crude, now rusted over and severely dented. For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.

17f6993cfa0l0i0nvrvi3hjy93drk.name: Marais Robe
17f6993cfa0l0i0nvrvi3hjy93drk.description: Robe with a black mantle across the shoulders. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais. The sons of House Marais are all sickly born. Little wonder that Maleigh Marais would be so beguiled by the beautiful and fierce goddess who was born into rot.

17f69967856l0i0nvrvvpq3818oul.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
17f69967856l0i0nvrvvpq3818oul.description: Armor worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. The wing-shaped ornaments on its back evoke the Deathbird. A self-inflicted curse that ties the spirits of these loyal knights to the land, having willingly beheaded themselves so that they may serve theirs masters in death.

17f6972fc30l0i0nvu6k4m9fl8hyqq.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
17f6972fc30l0i0nvu6k4m9fl8hyqq.description: Armor worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

17f698e101bl0i0nvu6km8okwrj0y.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor (altered)
17f698e101bl0i0nvu6km8okwrj0y.description: Lighter version of the Mausoleum Knight Armor

17f69824c90l0i0nw0v1hlt9jj1ozx.name: Mushroom Body
17f69824c90l0i0nw0v1hlt9jj1ozx.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the torso. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

17f696207eal0i0nwwj3wtlz7g8aq9.name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery (altered)
17f696207eal0i0nwwj3wtlz7g8aq9.description: Lighter version of the Nomadic Merchant's Finery

17f698f2b04l0i0nwx8nxr6l6d32v.name: Night's Cavalry Armor (altered)
17f698f2b04l0i0nwx8nxr6l6d32v.description: Lighter version of the Night's Cavalry Armor

17f69673ae1l0i0nwxtb89u8m5753k.name: Night's Cavalry Armor
17f69673ae1l0i0nwxtb89u8m5753k.description: Pitch-black armor thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

17f693b1016l0i0nwxu80z0xa8kekm.name: Night Maiden Armor
17f693b1016l0i0nwxu80z0xa8kekm.description: Armor worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City. Indicates the highest clerical rank, and includes a silk cape. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f6999a067l0i0nwzj711o2cc0yqp.name: Noble's Traveling Garb
17f6999a067l0i0nwzj711o2cc0yqp.description: Traveling attire fashioned from metallic white silk thread. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.

17f69b14080l0i0nx0vgixc55r6upm.name: Nox Monk Armor
17f69b14080l0i0nx0vgixc55r6upm.description: Armor worn by the monks of the Eternal City, with a silk cape attached. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f69b9a489l0i0nx39eemxjsgoymp.name: Nox Swordstress Armor (altered)
17f69b9a489l0i0nx39eemxjsgoymp.description: Lighter version of the Nox Swordstress Armor.

17f69a509bbl0i0nx3vmcxam3krt3o.name: Nox Monk Armor (altered)
17f69a509bbl0i0nx3vmcxam3krt3o.description: Lighter version of the Nox Monk Armor.

17f695e0fe5l0i0nx6r2i5erc2kvf6.name: Nox Swordstress Armor
17f695e0fe5l0i0nx6r2i5erc2kvf6.description: Armor worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City. These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and wear silk capes. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f697b2900l0i0ny38uuz0r5pdr9j.name: Omen Armor
17f697b2900l0i0ny38uuz0r5pdr9j.description: Malformed armor resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

17f6975a2a3l0i0ny3ai080wrk3lsp.name: Official's Attire
17f6975a2a3l0i0ny3ai080wrk3lsp.description: Grubby blue robe worn by magisterial officials to carry out their grim tasks. Surveillance, executions, gruesome rituals... The darkest duties drive the wheels of mankind.

17f698ea992l0i0ny4wcf7fv7vla87.name: Page Garb
17f698ea992l0i0ny4wcf7fv7vla87.description: Garb worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way.

17f69695c0el0i0ny52077yj185y9z.name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb
17f69695c0el0i0ny52077yj185y9z.description: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

17f695fc5e9l0i0ny6pluocbc0njii.name: Page Garb (altered)
17f695fc5e9l0i0ny6pluocbc0njii.description: Lighter version of the Page Garb.

17f6939021el0i0ny8nszn1fqncah.name: Perfumer Robe
17f6939021el0i0ny8nszn1fqncah.description: Robe of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

17f69a92933l0i0nyaq15mxrckj3us.name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb (altered)
17f69a92933l0i0nyaq15mxrckj3us.description: Lighter version of the Perfumer's Traveling Garb.

17f693fdda8l0i0nyb2rbpqu27cr3b.name: Perfumer Robe (altered)
17f693fdda8l0i0nyb2rbpqu27cr3b.description: Lighter version of the Perfurmer's Robe.

17f699bb950l0i0nybper9vajran2f.name: Omenkiller Robe
17f699bb950l0i0nybper9vajran2f.description: Robe worn by the Omenkillers, butchers of twisted conscience.

17f698cac0el0i0nycd3davor9bgxb.name: Old Aristocrat Gown
17f698cac0el0i0nycd3davor9bgxb.description: Gown of soft cloth adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

17f69933589l0i0nzb22p0udrb1exk.name: Preceptor's Long Gown (altered)
17f69933589l0i0nzb22p0udrb1exk.description: Lighter version of the Preceptor's Long Gown.

17f69743998l0i0nzb82tu77emq297.name: Preceptor's Long Gown
17f69743998l0i0nzb82tu77emq297.description: A long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals. Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.

17f695cfeb8l0i0nzbulagrw7trvz.name: Prophet Robe (altered)
17f695cfeb8l0i0nzbulagrw7trvz.description: Lighter version of the Prophet Robe.

17f693d4f51l0i0nzc7cb687wnz5x.name: Queen's Robe
17f693d4f51l0i0nzc7cb687wnz5x.description: Robe indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

17f6974c239l0i0nzd27sxin7m9wgs.name: Prophet Robe
17f6974c239l0i0nzd27sxin7m9wgs.description: Robe of exiled prophets who foresaw that their faith would end in flames  and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Its fabric scrapes against their skin like a file, and the rickety cart wheel around the neck warns passers-by not to lend an ear to their meandering sermons.

17f699daa0dl0i0nzeebj645zpvd7.name: Prisoner Clothing
17f699daa0dl0i0nzeebj645zpvd7.description: Tattered clothing. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy.

17f696cf5a8l0i0nzf8wq8jdphrd1n.name: Ragged Armor
17f696cf5a8l0i0nzf8wq8jdphrd1n.description: Armor pieced together from scavenged metal.

17f69305b9cl0i0nzfe5sbcydcuoq.name: Ragged Armor (altered)
17f69305b9cl0i0nzfe5sbcydcuoq.description: Lighter version of the Ragged Armor.

17f69a93d8al0i0nzfk2b270dz2hy3.name: Radahn's Lion Armor (altered)
17f69a93d8al0i0nzfk2b270dz2hy3.description: Lighter version of the Radahn's Lion Armor.

17f694feb21l0i0nzh8acjkpkeiky.name: Radahn's Lion Armor
17f694feb21l0i0nzh8acjkpkeiky.description: Armor depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn.

17f693ea468l0i0o0hcm10o39gutsk.name: Raging Wolf Armor (altered)
17f693ea468l0i0o0hcm10o39gutsk.description: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.

17f69b6fd53l0i0o0j5nmqgl7z5cq.name: Raya Lucarian Robe
17f69b6fd53l0i0o0j5nmqgl7z5cq.description: Robe worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Those who dedicate themselves to the study of glintstones formed from starry amber receive this modest yet elegant deep blue garb along with their vows of virtue and austerity. But with extended life, one is apt to forget old vows.

17f69394e18l0i0o0j6thxia007h2q.name: Raging Wolf Armor
17f69394e18l0i0o0j6thxia007h2q.description: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.

17f6969fdbdl0i0o0kiv7eeo5ioetg.name: Redmane Surcoat
17f6969fdbdl0i0o0kiv7eeo5ioetg.description: Armor worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.

17f6951007bl0i0o0kr79ygfqp4bfd.name: Ronin's Armor
17f6951007bl0i0o0kr79ygfqp4bfd.description: Armor of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn.

17f69b33f87l0i0o0laxlmu9r8hc2l.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
17f69b33f87l0i0o0laxlmu9r8hc2l.description: Thick, bristly cloak eaten through by scarlet rot. The symbol of an underground gravekeeper's station.

17f697ebe2bl0i0o0lle3u1i1nh548.name: Redmane Knight Armor (altered)
17f697ebe2bl0i0o0lle3u1i1nh548.description: Lighter version of the Redmane Knight Armor. The armor is not as sturdy as the original, but it still provides a decent amount of protection.

17f6933d170l0i0o0qj066wsiqj3utq.name: Ronin's Armor (altered)
17f6933d170l0i0o0qj066wsiqj3utq.description: Lighter version of the Ronin's Armor. The armor is not as sturdy as the original, but it still provides a decent amount of protection.

17f69873819l0i0o0r1uvfhzbc5x0q.name: Redmane Knight Armor
17f69873819l0i0o0r1uvfhzbc5x0q.description: Armor worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.

17f694e6f19l0i0o0r406cvwvhvfuvs.name: Raptor's Black Feathers
17f694e6f19l0i0o0r406cvwvhvfuvs.description: Robe crafted with the black feathers of a bird of prey. Worn by the assassin Ravenmount.

17f696062dbl0i0o1vjw0pszkp8o3.name: Royal Knight Armor
17f696062dbl0i0o1vjw0pszkp8o3.description: Silver armor of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

17f6985d49bl0i0o1vs0ag273l395x.name: Royal Knight Armor (altered)
17f6985d49bl0i0o1vs0ag273l395x.description: Lighter version of the Royal Knight Armor. The armor is not as sturdy as the original, but it still provides a decent amount of protection.

17f6960d468l0i0o1vvspbdd3574m.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak (altered)
17f6960d468l0i0o1vvspbdd3574m.description: Lighter version of the Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak.

17f6940ca21l0i0o1wc4m99v7p5igd.name: Royal Remains Armor
17f6940ca21l0i0o1wc4m99v7p5igd.description: Armory graces with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

17f694b4a42l0i0o1wscyguflco4ib.name: Scaled Armor
17f694b4a42l0i0o1wscyguflco4ib.description: Armor worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.

17f693d4b0el0i0o1wz4i3tbj2s79y.name: Sanguine Noble Robe
17f693d4b0el0i0o1wz4i3tbj2s79y.description: Robe of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. The grand metallic pattern on the shoulder is a signifier of the noble rank they intend to claim upon the advent of the new dynasty they are working to install.

17f6942f55el0i0o1xhk30z9st70s.name: Ruler's Robe
17f6942f55el0i0o1xhk30z9st70s.description: Luxurious robe worn by lords in a smaller nation. Its fine blue mantle serves to prove its wearer's status.

17f694a40a4l0i0o1yzkmzkj7qtz1g.name: Scaled Armor (altered)
17f694a40a4l0i0o1yzkmzkj7qtz1g.description: Lighter version of the Scaled Armor

17f69489f83l0i0o1za354buhm1f4b.name: Sage Robe
17f69489f83l0i0o1za354buhm1f4b.description: Thick burgundy robe. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.

17f698de927l0i0o1zhdlr6n70nh1.name: Scale Armor
17f698de927l0i0o1zhdlr6n70nh1.description: Armor reinforced with small metal scales. The cape covering the shoulders is made with treated rock lizard skin, and provides ample protection against fire.

17f6948a10fl0i0o30qs19wbmzyn4d.name: Traveling Maiden Robe (altered)
17f6948a10fl0i0o30qs19wbmzyn4d.description: Lighter version of the Traveling Maiden Robe

17f693c2697l0i0o327i079jp778zm.name: Snow Witch Robe (altered)
17f693c2697l0i0o327i079jp778zm.description: Lighter version of the Snow Witch Robe

17f69a60e34l0i0o328szegomnr0h8.name: Scarlet Tabard
17f69a60e34l0i0o328szegomnr0h8.description: Padded cloth armor with the telltale stains of the scarlet rot. Worn by foot soldiers in General Radahn's army

17f69a6da4dl0i0o329ec8lxaexetl.name: Shaman Furs
17f69a6da4dl0i0o329ec8lxaexetl.description: Raiment fashioned from a bristly pelt. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.

17f69bc7f9bl0i0o32fxquvyqp5nio.name: Traveling Maiden Robe
17f69bc7f9bl0i0o32fxquvyqp5nio.description: Robe worn by traveling maidens. Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.

17f69a52118l0i0o3387jplhquxn3.name: Snow Witch Robe
17f69a52118l0i0o3387jplhquxn3.description: Witch's robe in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

17f699a3a77l0i0o35anr2ntuenlpi.name: Tree Sentinel Armor
17f699a3a77l0i0o35anr2ntuenlpi.description: Golden armor of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

17f696fb35dl0i0o379hohibhldyx.name: Spellblade's Traveling Attire (altered)
17f696fb35dl0i0o379hohibhldyx.description: Lighter version of the Spellblade's Traveling Attire

17f6983e15bl0i0o3ag7let01tccgy.name: Spellblade's Traveling Attire
17f6983e15bl0i0o3ag7let01tccgy.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

17f6993ab06l0i0o3uqmctbvuty9u.name: Tree Sentinel Armor (altered)
17f6993ab06l0i0o3uqmctbvuty9u.description: Lighter version of the Tree Sentinel Armor

17f6972ac01l0i0o44tshfdh1pnb8.name: Twinned Armor (altered)
17f6972ac01l0i0o44tshfdh1pnb8.description: Lighter version of the Twinned Armor

17f698f800dl0i0o46usza3kek0mlc.name: Vagabond Knight Armor (altered)
17f698f800dl0i0o46usza3kek0mlc.description: Lighter version of the Vagabond Knight Armor

17f697e174dl0i0o48c1nkk005ndtlj.name: Vagabond Knight Armor
17f697e174dl0i0o48c1nkk005ndtlj.description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland.  Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.

17f6968c171l0i0o4ajjybq3d8j288.name: Veteran's Armor
17f6968c171l0i0o4ajjybq3d8j288.description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.

17f69b2bcaal0i0o4bk6dl7fug97ng.name: Twinned Armor
17f69b2bcaal0i0o4bk6dl7fug97ng.description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

17f699fb877l0i0o4gys04cxbs86i.name: Veteran's Armor (altered)
17f699fb877l0i0o4gys04cxbs86i.description: Lighter version of the Veteran's Armor

17f69398ebcl0i0o4jsqk0wa9fjtn.name: Tree Surcoat
17f69398ebcl0i0o4jsqk0wa9fjtn.description: Blue surcoat draped over chainmail. The tree insignia emblazoned on the front depicts the Erdtree, and is a design beloved throughout the Lands Between.

17f698ca6e3l0i0o4k9zjwfnu6bkgs.name: Upper-class Robe
17f698ca6e3l0i0o4k9zjwfnu6bkgs.description: Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children. Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.

17f69717672l0i0o4r89nf02o5si0o.name: Tree-and-beast Surcoat
17f69717672l0i0o4r89nf02o5si0o.description: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. The surcoat depicts the distant Erdtree and the beast regent, an emblem of the golden lineage. Both are symbols of glory now past.

17f69806db9l0i0o4sjvehds3cmarp.name: Vulgar Militia Armor
17f69806db9l0i0o4sjvehds3cmarp.description: Armor worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.

17f69af6e5bl0i0o5hhktksp2jmt5.name: White Reed Armor
17f69af6e5bl0i0o5hhktksp2jmt5.description: Armor of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina.

17f6963ee22l0i0o5lqhnt3sl29aif.name: War Surgeon Gown
17f6963ee22l0i0o5lqhnt3sl29aif.description: "Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varr, that is; though he was an exception."

17f699ae26al0i0o5qexxzvp3cwnw.name: War Surgeon Gown (altered)
17f699ae26al0i0o5qexxzvp3cwnw.description: Lighter version of the War Surgeon Gown.

17f69569ff4l0i0o5u2wskq7pesy49.name: Azur's Manchettes
17f69569ff4l0i0o5u2wskq7pesy49.description: Manchettes corroded by blue-green glintstones. Worn by Azur, primeval current sorcerer.

17f695766c8l0i0o5wasui4pl06qia.name: Battlemage Manchettes
17f695766c8l0i0o5wasui4pl06qia.description: Manchettes worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

17f69652c6fl0i0o5x1bsdx0d6pona.name: Astrologer Gloves
17f69652c6fl0i0o5x1bsdx0d6pona.description: Gloves fashioned from fine, supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.

17f695f7dfcl0i0o5xe2kug0vg0iiz.name: Bandit Manchettes
17f695f7dfcl0i0o5xe2kug0vg0iiz.description: Manchettes made by simple wrapping dirty cloth around the arms. Worn by bandits.

17f69862434l0i0o5z4v0cvfozbd5.name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
17f69862434l0i0o5z4v0cvfozbd5.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. These gauntlets were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.

17f697fc762l0i0o5zexo0qk2z7ts9.name: Zamor Armor
17f697fc762l0i0o5zexo0qk2z7ts9.description: Armor worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

17f695c02ebl0i0o6gegz5qdy7kztd.name: Beast Champion Gauntlets
17f695c02ebl0i0o6gegz5qdy7kztd.description: Silver gauntlets engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant. Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was. Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.

17f69727c7el0i0o6hgopjq1dozrl.name: Black Knife Gauntlets
17f69727c7el0i0o6hgopjq1dozrl.description: Gauntlets used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

17f694f3eadl0i0o7mtggrz1ofisub.name: Blackflame Monk Gauntlets
17f694f3eadl0i0o7mtggrz1ofisub.description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Blackflame Monks.

17f695d9337l0i0o7r1gta915accj.name: Blaidd's Gauntlets
17f695d9337l0i0o7r1gta915accj.description: Well-worn black gauntlets of the man-wolf Blaidd.

17f6958f14el0i0o7rcnxhisq53oq8.name: Brave's Bracer
17f6958f14el0i0o7rcnxhisq53oq8.description: Gauntlets wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.

17f693143a2l0i0o7sb9iurg2imsc.name: Briar Gauntlets
17f693143a2l0i0o7sb9iurg2imsc.description: Battered iron gauntlets from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar.

17f69a9b4adl0i0o7ta34gq0aep43h.name: Bull-goat Gauntlets
17f69a9b4adl0i0o7ta34gq0aep43h.description: Great Horned Tragoth's gauntlets. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise.

17f69b9eb6bl0i0o7tl4067pzud217.name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
17f69b9eb6bl0i0o7tl4067pzud217.description: Manchettes formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood. Any protection is welcome for the festering arms beneath.

17f69600773l0i0o7unm0v4n59mz9d.name: Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets
17f69600773l0i0o7unm0v4n59mz9d.description: Metal gauntlets of the Bloodhound Knights.

17f69b50907l0i0o7utskwb58lgaii.name: Blue Silver Bracelets
17f69b50907l0i0o7utskwb58lgaii.description: Bracelets crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.

17f69b923f1l0i0o7wiqlqbak2haqc.name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
17f69b923f1l0i0o7wiqlqbak2haqc.description: Gauntlets of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen,  were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

17f697c8d05l0i0o81mkc86pyw8tdh.name: Chain Gauntlets
17f697c8d05l0i0o81mkc86pyw8tdh.description: Gauntlets made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.

17f697642d0l0i0o98xc24ahp9u15s.name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
17f697642d0l0i0o98xc24ahp9u15s.description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f69a6ec0bl0i0o99uudum2zc466g.name: Confessor Gloves
17f69a6ec0bl0i0o99uudum2zc466g.description: Black leather gloves of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.

17f69aed2ffl0i0o9a404fc0nm7z59o.name: Cleanrot Gauntlets
17f69aed2ffl0i0o9a404fc0nm7z59o.description: Gauntlets of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering. The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

17f69c14bf9l0i0o9a50murdvyr8wg.name: Champion Bracers
17f69c14bf9l0i0o9a50murdvyr8wg.description: Bracers reserved for the bandlands' bravest.  Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes.  Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.

17f69a5c5bbl0i0o9b3mzby0ky19w.name: Champion Gauntlets
17f69a5c5bbl0i0o9b3mzby0ky19w.description: Gauntlets reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.

17f699ef9dal0i0o9b5uipzj8nilf.name: Elden Lord Bracers
17f699ef9dal0i0o9b5uipzj8nilf.description: Bracers of Godfrey the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.

17f69564c64l0i0o9bzue4p82jaqx.name: Eccentric's Manchettes
17f69564c64l0i0o9bzue4p82jaqx.description: The knight Jerren's manchettes. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.

17f693ad5d9l0i0o9cknym209rdqu.name: Drake Knight Gauntlets
17f693ad5d9l0i0o9cknym209rdqu.description: Black iron gauntlets worn by drake knights. Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion. From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe

17f699674a7l0i0o9cphpbh7jo0gv7.name: Crucible Gauntlets
17f699674a7l0i0o9cphpbh7jo0gv7.description: Gauntlets of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations. In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.

17f699ad810l0i0oaoz2ac2zvdty1n.name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
17f699ad810l0i0oaoz2ac2zvdty1n.description: Commonplace leather manchettes. Their hands are inlaid with dulled glintstone.

17f6994bd42l0i0oap9tgxmdz4rsmd.name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
17f6994bd42l0i0oap9tgxmdz4rsmd.description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Fire Monks.

17f69655c81l0i0oarbwusjaln8dq9.name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets
17f69655c81l0i0oarbwusjaln8dq9.description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f696b459bl0i0oarls7aeninpc4m.name: Gelmir Knight Gauntlets
17f696b459bl0i0oarls7aeninpc4m.description: Gauntlets worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f69a12d9cl0i0oarplwe9hm6wjv.name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets
17f69a12d9cl0i0oarplwe9hm6wjv.description: Metal gauntlets covered in nicks and dents. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f69a09a71l0i0oarrl7u2hkrar9p.name: Exile Gauntlets
17f69a09a71l0i0oarrl7u2hkrar9p.description: Damaged iron gauntlets. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.

17f695372c3l0i0oarsspg4ejbh4x.name: Fingerprint Gauntlets
17f695372c3l0i0oarsspg4ejbh4x.description: Iron gauntlets singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

17f69932fbdl0i0oaxc7lwu7prd3kd.name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
17f69932fbdl0i0oaxc7lwu7prd3kd.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f69adc730l0i0oayoby83p8xiwnl.name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
17f69adc730l0i0oayoby83p8xiwnl.description: Black iron gauntlets with the appearance of flames. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.

17f69552966l0i0oazfa77xdvanncu.name: Godskin Apostle Bracelets
17f69552966l0i0oazfa77xdvanncu.description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Apostles.

17f69654affl0i0oc85nksgx9drm8.name: Highwayman Gauntlets
17f69654affl0i0oc85nksgx9drm8.description: Hideously stained and dented gauntlets. Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

17f6945fca2l0i0ocbqlthlf2ve9ng.name: Godskin Noble Bracelets
17f6945fca2l0i0ocbqlthlf2ve9ng.description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

17f69823d53l0i0occko5j66qlc4tm.name: Haligtree Gauntlets
17f69823d53l0i0occko5j66qlc4tm.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f69c275c9l0i0ocdyuhcyebjccc.name: Haligtree Knight Gauntlets
17f69c275c9l0i0ocdyuhcyebjccc.description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f69633e9el0i0ocfz1gvzw0dagvj.name: Hoslow's Gauntlets
17f69633e9el0i0ocfz1gvzw0dagvj.description: Garish silver gauntlets decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.

17f6978cc9el0i0ochs0lykeqg1oay9.name: Gold Bracelets
17f6978cc9el0i0ochs0lykeqg1oay9.description: Bracelets made in the image of Erdtree branches. Minimal adornments made my Lord Goldmask's disciples. Those disciples have long since left him.

17f69a01c9cl0i0oci9vixulbuoexe.name: Guardian Bracers
17f69a01c9cl0i0oci9vixulbuoexe.description: Engraved golden bracers. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtree.

17f695058d7l0i0ocivy48k7k9l11k.name: Golden Prosthetic
17f695058d7l0i0ocivy48k7k9l11k.description: Golden prosthetic forged using ancient techniques

17f69adf4c2l0i0odlid8lejwstaeu.name: Knight Gauntlets
17f69adf4c2l0i0odlid8lejwstaeu.description: Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

17f69647ef1l0i0odt2cfmif5045ua.name: Land Of Reeds Gauntlets
17f69647ef1l0i0odt2cfmif5045ua.description: Gauntlets wrapped in tough leather. Worn by the warriors of the Land of Reeds

17f695c3ff9l0i0odvnq2v5kiezuxo.name: Lusat's Manchettes
17f695c3ff9l0i0odvnq2v5kiezuxo.description: Manchettes corroded by blue glintstones. Worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.

17f69345295l0i0odvo3gukydx02yf.name: Maliketh's Gauntlets
17f69345295l0i0odvo3gukydx02yf.description: Beast's gauntlets made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyral half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions

17f69743431l0i0odwtjw9ktch75jr.name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
17f69743431l0i0odwtjw9ktch75jr.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f698690e2l0i0odxho9jo3dx4m2t.name: Leather Gloves
17f698690e2l0i0odxho9jo3dx4m2t.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather gloves worn by a savvy soldier. Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

17f69aa91d7l0i0oe1pj6fo1o9vsx.name: Malenia's Gauntlet
17f69aa91d7l0i0oe1pj6fo1o9vsx.description: Gauntlet made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a godhe is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

17f695bb780l0i0oe3tjfx58cget0s.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
17f695bb780l0i0oe3tjfx58cget0s.description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster

17f6988983cl0i0of7tbik91hvj0rj.name: Omen Gauntlets
17f6988983cl0i0of7tbik91hvj0rj.description: Malformed Gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

17f6952d31fl0i0ofc3j9nf2llq7yi.name: Mushroom Arms
17f6952d31fl0i0ofc3j9nf2llq7yi.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the arms.

17f692c707bl0i0ofc3oguearc3gzo.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
17f692c707bl0i0ofc3oguearc3gzo.description: Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Walking Mausoleum. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f696b894el0i0ofdbtcjix5qajrp.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
17f696b894el0i0ofdbtcjix5qajrp.description: Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f69a7eb92l0i0ofelpljitl8hw9s.name: Millicent's Gloves
17f69a7eb92l0i0ofelpljitl8hw9s.description: Gloves worn by Millicent the Rotting

17f693fc837l0i0off9ln8pmeyhp0g.name: Nox Monk Bracelets
17f693fc837l0i0off9ln8pmeyhp0g.description: Bracelets worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f69b16c57l0i0ofgwwi9eoabz75h.name: Noble's Gloves
17f69b16c57l0i0ofgwwi9eoabz75h.description: Gloves of plush leather. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.

17f69959ba1l0i0ofnm4hp9r73aakd.name: Perfumer Gloves
17f69959ba1l0i0ofnm4hp9r73aakd.description: Gloves of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

17f6948f4adl0i0ofnyfaygrek4ks9.name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets
17f6948f4adl0i0ofnyfaygrek4ks9.description: Pitch-black gauntlets thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

17f698eeb10l0i0ofo0efh0z69hbud.name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
17f698eeb10l0i0ofo0efh0z69hbud.description: Long,stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.

17f696136efl0i0ogu3uw8ly0921xa.name: Preceptor's Gloves
17f696136efl0i0ogu3uw8ly0921xa.description: Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals. Black and perfectly discreet.

17f6961d885l0i0ogv0ohqr5fp3eh.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
17f6961d885l0i0ogv0ohqr5fp3eh.description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f6935b153l0i0ogyoj212pfkjsqo.name: Ragged Gloves
17f6935b153l0i0ogyoj212pfkjsqo.description: Gauntlets pieced together from scavenged metal.

17f69b773e3l0i0ogypin7yhii9kfj.name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
17f69b773e3l0i0ogypin7yhii9kfj.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f6965bc45l0i0ogypt00zh5h9xs.name: Radahn's Gauntlets
17f6965bc45l0i0ogypt00zh5h9xs.description: Gauntlets depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn.

17f69c1e97bl0i0oh39wplhaw02cqa.name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
17f69c1e97bl0i0oh39wplhaw02cqa.description: Silver gauntlets of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

17f6951b093l0i0oh3ytmwlknn9uvf.name: Ronin's Gauntlets
17f6951b093l0i0oh3ytmwlknn9uvf.description: Gauntlets of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn.

17f6965e1c4l0i0oh5u13b51hwsrb6i.name: Queen's Bracelets
17f6965e1c4l0i0oh5u13b51hwsrb6i.description: Bracelets indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

17f69444171l0i0oh899jhls75u4of.name: Royal Remains Gauntlets
17f69444171l0i0oh899jhls75u4of.description: Gauntlets graces with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

17f699b7af3l0i0oipdsndvnog1dpo.name: Traveler's Gloves
17f699b7af3l0i0oipdsndvnog1dpo.description: Gloves of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

17f696aafc4l0i0oirnrri0ir86n0g.name: Tree Sentinel Gauntlets
17f696aafc4l0i0oirnrri0ir86n0g.description: Golden gauntlets of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

17f69b2e1f0l0i0oivw4at5v3v4x2z.name: Sorcerer Manchettes
17f69b2e1f0l0i0oivw4at5v3v4x2z.description: Manchettes worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the forearms.

17f69beb172l0i0oiwxuzup65qtki.name: Twinned Gauntlets
17f69beb172l0i0oiwxuzup65qtki.description: Gauntlets depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

17f69ac481fl0i0oixc66oi6ytj1ek.name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
17f69ac481fl0i0oixc66oi6ytj1ek.description: Gauntlets of a knight banished form their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.

17f69601d4al0i0oiyy2ixfq183jgb.name: Veteran's Gauntlets
17f69601d4al0i0oiyy2ixfq183jgb.description: Old gauntlets that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.

17f69394600l0i0oiyz8qmiiuhz2ra.name: Scaled Gauntlets
17f69394600l0i0oiyz8qmiiuhz2ra.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks. Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.

17f69498b16l0i0oj35pl67ifnlj9a.name: Spellblade's Gloves
17f69498b16l0i0oj35pl67ifnlj9a.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

17f693a7860l0i0oknl7694p0mh7v.name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
17f693a7860l0i0oknl7694p0mh7v.description: Gauntlets worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.

17f693eea6bl0i0okx2njnrl2iildc.name: Aristocrat Hat
17f693eea6bl0i0okx2njnrl2iildc.description: Leather hat decorated with a withered feather. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor.

17f697896bel0i0okxiwm6mnh3zz6j.name: Warrior Gauntlets
17f697896bel0i0okxiwm6mnh3zz6j.description: Gauntlets of a nomadic warrior. Crafted from sturdy leather.

17f694c1311l0i0ol1qo5xm03vrgok.name: Alberich's Pointed Hat (altered)
17f694c1311l0i0ol1qo5xm03vrgok.description: Lighter version of the Alberich's Pointed Hat.

17f69377b19l0i0ol1swx6o1hyi35o.name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
17f69377b19l0i0ol1swx6o1hyi35o.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner.

17f6931bed0l0i0ol1tlx0aiheggu.name: War Surgeon Gloves
17f6931bed0l0i0ol1tlx0aiheggu.description: Bloodstained white gloves of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varr, that is; though he was an exception

17f69a8afbbl0i0ol3s36b3idrf5x5.name: Zamor Bracelets
17f69a8afbbl0i0ol3s36b3idrf5x5.description: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

17f692edc25l0i0ol5e2s17vq7v4wq.name: White Reed Gauntlets
17f692edc25l0i0ol5e2s17vq7v4wq.description: Gauntlets of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.

17f69600328l0i0on3l3z1z6jv0lrt.name: Bandit Mask
17f69600328l0i0on3l3z1z6jv0lrt.description: Mask of black cloth that covers the mouth. Favored by bandits for hiding their faces, it also provides some protection against poison.

17f695d037el0i0on3psdxvuouz67s.name: Black Dumpling
17f695d037el0i0on3psdxvuouz67s.description: Mask forced on a victim's head to lend torture an extra degree of cruelty. It magnifies one's fears and make them acutely aware of all forms of pain Raises attack power when the wearer suffers from madness. When the Black Dumpling goes on, the torturer no longer seeks answers; only to inflict suffering without hope of relief.

17f6948386bl0i0on4t6xzj16dejzm.name: Banished Knight Helm (altered)
17f6948386bl0i0on4t6xzj16dejzm.description: Lighter version of the Banished Knight Helm

17f69858eb0l0i0on54p2gfohha90e.name: Ash-of-war Scarab
17f69858eb0l0i0on54p2gfohha90e.description: Gray scarab worn directly on the head.

17f699271d3l0i0on6tce8ayc3kic.name: Astrologer Hood
17f699271d3l0i0on6tce8ayc3kic.description: Hood fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.

17f69c20d31l0i0on75g02np9ldmub.name: Black Hood
17f69c20d31l0i0on75g02np9ldmub.description: Hood of lusterless black fabric that conceals its wearer's identity.

17f695b9b2bl0i0on94j5g3fwtv4f.name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
17f695b9b2bl0i0on94j5g3fwtv4f.description: Crown of Azur, primeval current sorcerer, set with a prominent blue-green glintstone.

17f69ac8d83l0i0on9b78j283zdb3c.name: Banished Knight Helm
17f69ac8d83l0i0on9b78j283zdb3c.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.

17f69b5a95cl0i0onb5s3gw477p75.name: Beast Champion Helm
17f69b5a95cl0i0onb5s3gw477p75.description: Silver helm engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.

17f6965c7afl0i0oors9r1s1ulmh1p.name: Black Wolf Mask
17f6965c7afl0i0oors9r1s1ulmh1p.description: A mask fashioned after the head of a black wolf.

17f6966b53cl0i0oosmb5p6q5qdlie.name: Bloodsoaked Mask
17f6966b53cl0i0oosmb5p6q5qdlie.description: Mask formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood. Even the most ghastly cover is more inviting than the festering face beneath.

17f698bfbd5l0i0oosutzqaoowrtf.name: Black Knife Hood
17f698bfbd5l0i0oosutzqaoowrtf.description: Hood used by the Black Knife Assassins. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be N u men who had close ties with Marika herself.

17f6957a63fl0i0oovz7b4oy8p5sg5.name: Blue Silver Mail Hood
17f6957a63fl0i0oovz7b4oy8p5sg5.description: Chainmail hood crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.

17f69af9da6l0i0ooxmok4mxl6swwr.name: Bloodhound Knight Helm
17f69af9da6l0i0ooxmok4mxl6swwr.description: Metal helm with a pointed beak. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.

17f69b1c4d5l0i0ooxx6c6v58994m2.name: Blackguard's Iron Mask
17f69b1c4d5l0i0ooxx6c6v58994m2.description: Iron mask forced on convicted prisoners. Worn by the blackguard Big Boggart. To Boggart, the mask made him all the more threatening, and helped him get what he wanted. But it was also a mirror of his emptiness.

17f69406c8bl0i0ooy9wkif1vedtms.name: Blue Festive Hood
17f69406c8bl0i0ooy9wkif1vedtms.description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Use of this hood, dyed in a stunning blue, is only permitted for the young maids who play the central role in the festival.

17f695e29e2l0i0op3yqenk2g551h9.name: Blackflame Monk Hood
17f695e29e2l0i0op3yqenk2g551h9.description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with black flames.

17f69a0e9c3l0i0op85xko5kr7u06j.name: Blue Cloth Cowl
17f69a0e9c3l0i0op85xko5kr7u06j.description: Cowl of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer. Just as still waters turn foul, stagnation leads to decay. Warriors must remain ever-drifting.

17f69a16335l0i0oqmglk4lq7pv3zj.name: Champion Headband
17f69a16335l0i0oqmglk4lq7pv3zj.description: Headband reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.

17f69991171l0i0oqodkekpq7kxpps.name: Chain Coif
17f69991171l0i0oqodkekpq7kxpps.description: Coif made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.

17f69654befl0i0oqpddt81oyl2ymq.name: Bull-goat Helm
17f69654befl0i0oqpddt81oyl2ymq.description: Great Horned Tragoth's helm, adorned with a gold bull-goat motif. Provides high poise.

17f69477d43l0i0oqqtcyx0gj0km2q.name: Brave's Cord Circlet
17f69477d43l0i0oqqtcyx0gj0km2q.description: Warrior's headband of woven leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. The small flags, white cloths and sheaves of wheat often found hung from these headbands are prayers of farewell from the people of their home. In bidding farewell t warriors departing on a journey from which they aren't like to return, this small act offers only meager relief.

17f69488d67l0i0oqufjqdi484wn2.name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
17f69488d67l0i0oqufjqdi484wn2.description: Blue scarab worn directly on the head. These scarabs roll clumps of cerulean tears during their labors.

17f69bd9f0el0i0oqvgpko7mchqig.name: Cleanrot Helm
17f69bd9f0el0i0oqvgpko7mchqig.description: Winged helm of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.

17f69ba1fd5l0i0oqx2o4ssdcb0cjp.name: Carian Knight Helm
17f69ba1fd5l0i0oqx2o4ssdcb0cjp.description: Helm of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

17f69a0c78cl0i0oqxlf9xbqjdg8.name: Briar Helm
17f69a0c78cl0i0oqxlf9xbqjdg8.description: Battered iron helm from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of he Brair.

17f69b13128l0i0or2eokpqdvdmv2b.name: Brave's Leather Helm
17f69b13128l0i0or2eokpqdvdmv2b.description: Battlewear wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.

17f69b50692l0i0ors8nfgenfh7k6r.name: Cleanrot Helm (altered)
17f69b50692l0i0ors8nfgenfh7k6r.description: Lighter version of the Cleanrot Helm

17f695e92c2l0i0osb5pvuxurlcp6e.name: Confessor Hood
17f695e92c2l0i0osb5pvuxurlcp6e.description: Black hood for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.

17f6969dd30l0i0osbp6z8er5o8d6s.name: Commoner's Headband (altered)
17f6969dd30l0i0osbp6z8er5o8d6s.description: Lighter version of the Commoner's Headband

17f69932e0dl0i0osbzj9wtyl6vbrm.name: Confessor Hood (altered)
17f69932e0dl0i0osbzj9wtyl6vbrm.description: Lighter version of the Confessor Hood

17f6953ed39l0i0oscswmckaqk283r.name: Commoner's Headband
17f6953ed39l0i0oscswmckaqk283r.description: A headband with the cloth removed. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.

17f696b2ac9l0i0oshpfbw6uzu459u.name: Consort's Mask
17f696b2ac9l0i0oshpfbw6uzu459u.description: Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen.

17f6942b378l0i0osl39wglen5m7i9.name: Crucible Axe Helm
17f6942b378l0i0osl39wglen5m7i9.description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The axe ornamentation is the knight Ordovis's mark, displayed also by his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.

17f69821e3al0i0osnhpfh1en4fhtm.name: Crimson Hood
17f69821e3al0i0osnhpfh1en4fhtm.description: A hooded cloak of vivid crimson.  Worn by expatriates royalty.  Increases vigor.

17f695f6021l0i0osqh6be3w8uqx7o.name: Crimson Tear Scarab
17f695f6021l0i0osqh6be3w8uqx7o.description: Red scarab worn directly on the head. The red scarabs roll clumps of crimson tears during their labors.

17f6974f196l0i0ossd4lgj2ejtdo8.name: Crucible Tree Helm
17f6974f196l0i0ossd4lgj2ejtdo8.description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The great tree ornamentation is the knight Siluria's mark, displayed also by her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.

17f6964162al0i0ou0qpop2bf6vzth.name: Diallos's Mask
17f6964162al0i0ou0qpop2bf6vzth.description: Replica of a twin-tailed silver helm with flowery adornments. Only, without the twin tails.

17f696a1925l0i0ou20hihbpko4bm6.name: Drake Knight Helm (altered)
17f696a1925l0i0ou20hihbpko4bm6.description: Lighter version of the Drake Knight Helm.

17f69844223l0i0ou28cnmxfdjn7pc.name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
17f69844223l0i0ou28cnmxfdjn7pc.description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights. Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.

17f69a11473l0i0ou9k3d7vcgx07cm.name: Duelist Helm
17f69a11473l0i0ou9k3d7vcgx07cm.description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.

17f697b6acal0i0oubruczgxdx9ikq.name: Eccentric's Hood
17f697b6acal0i0oubruczgxdx9ikq.description: A pointy, ragged hood. Worn by the knight Jerren. The hood hides an aged, bearded mask. Jerren served General Radahn as a guest commander, and they are said to have sworn an oath of honorable death to one another.

17f699cce1al0i0ouctgvb37626x24.name: Drake Knight Helm
17f699cce1al0i0ouctgvb37626x24.description: Black iron helm worn by drake knights. Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion. From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe

17f69c4cdd0l0i0oucw3g2vwat2x2.name: Eccentric's Hood (altered)
17f69c4cdd0l0i0oucw3g2vwat2x2.description: Lighter version of the Eccentric's Hood
