17f697a43cfl0i0oud5840qodk7im8.name: Elden Lord Crown
17f697a43cfl0i0oud5840qodk7im8.description: Crown of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.

17f694d5b35l0i0ouyv7r9fhf6e5hg.name: Envoy Crown
17f694d5b35l0i0ouyv7r9fhf6e5hg.description: The soft bundle worn on the head by Oracle Envoys. Densely wrapped in several layers of cloth. Raises the potency of bubble-based skills. No one knows what the cloth hides, but some claim to have heard a faint whimpering from inside. It must have been their imagination.

17f69906ec7l0i0ov1phhpwvgvqev6.name: Exile Hood
17f69906ec7l0i0ov1phhpwvgvqev6.description: Deep red hood that covers the whole head. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies, who were required to keep their faces hidden.

17f692d0fbcl0i0ovsczesu9l4suj.name: Festive Hood (altered)
17f692d0fbcl0i0ovsczesu9l4suj.description: Lighter version of the Festive Hood

17f69855a34l0i0ovty8rhwq2rl4i.name: Festive Hood
17f69855a34l0i0ovty8rhwq2rl4i.description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Decorated with many-colored flowers.

17f69516885l0i0ovv0vucbn8q9u5o.name: Finger Maiden Fillet
17f69516885l0i0ovv0vucbn8q9u5o.description: Fillet worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.

17f697cb110l0i0ovwk6xur5qnwbhk.name: Fire Monk Hood
17f697cb110l0i0ovwk6xur5qnwbhk.description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with flames. Attire of the Fire Monks.

17f69337d12l0i0ovwtctjd032p2zn.name: Fire Prelate Helm
17f69337d12l0i0ovwtctjd032p2zn.description: Helm engraved with a sacred countenance and housing a cauldron. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.

17f6969f632l0i0ovwwo0wtpuzvocq.name: Fia's Hood
17f6969f632l0i0ovwwo0wtpuzvocq.description: Hood of black cloth that covers the whole head. Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.

17f697dbdecl0i0ovxiltdyjytpbt9.name: Fingerprint Helm
17f697dbdecl0i0ovxiltdyjytpbt9.description: Iron helm singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

17f69877054l0i0ow67dzczoccaehw.name: Foot Soldier Cap
17f69877054l0i0ow67dzczoccaehw.description: Flanged iron cap widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f6998676al0i0ow7occadh7p6bhd.name: Foot Soldier Helm
17f6998676al0i0ow7occadh7p6bhd.description: Wholly unembellished iron helm. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f6958bc93l0i0owvn6kwrjrr5z6t.name: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
17f6958bc93l0i0owvn6kwrjrr5z6t.description: Flanged cap made from gilded iron. Issued to foot soldiers protecting the royal capital of Leyndell.

17f69669d03l0i0owwfzx2m5d017fj.name: Gelmir Knight Helm
17f69669d03l0i0owwfzx2m5d017fj.description: Helm worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Its crest of red feathers symbolizes Rykard's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son.

17f697b1119l0i0owym1alieezqf6o.name: Glintstone Scarab
17f697b1119l0i0owym1alieezqf6o.description: Blue-green scarab worn directly on the head. These scarabs roll clumps of sorcery during their labors.

17f69bf3d3el0i0ox130u36g1qnq5dk.name: Godrick Knight Helm
17f69bf3d3el0i0ox130u36g1qnq5dk.description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.

17f69c042bal0i0ox26ulvxoxd05a.name: Grass Hair Ornament
17f69c042bal0i0ox26ulvxoxd05a.description: A headdress made from wildflowers. Wearing this might make you less easy to spot.

17f693dd5c8l0i0ox5zges4e525q55.name: Godskin Noble Hood
17f693dd5c8l0i0ox5zges4e525q55.description: Hood made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unilke the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

17f69bb7818l0i0ox811gnrl6ersvo.name: Foot Soldier Helmet
17f69bb7818l0i0ox811gnrl6ersvo.description: Helmet with a protective metal plate. Widely issued to foot soldiers in lord's army.

17f699c6f57l0i0ox8b667wvx9611w.name: Godrick Soldier Helm
17f699c6f57l0i0ox8b667wvx9611w.description: Helm worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.

17f6989b8a1l0i0oxc717li12uf4am.name: Godskin Apostle Hood
17f6989b8a1l0i0oxc717li12uf4am.description: Hood made by seweing together patches of smooth skin. Worn by the Godskin Apostles.

17f697b44f0l0i0oxxa6eb4f0fh3e8.name: Great Horned Headband
17f697b44f0l0i0oxxa6eb4f0fh3e8.description: Headband decorated by a pair of great horns.

17f696ec6cfl0i0oyb7po568qq8re.name: Greathood
17f696ec6cfl0i0oyb7po568qq8re.description: Hood far larger than the head it is meant to cover. A burial shroud of sorts for those who discover, at long last, the truth they sought.

17f69817673l0i0oyc8ncpqgjvrcif.name: Guilty Hood
17f69817673l0i0oyc8ncpqgjvrcif.description: Coarse hooded cloak of olive brown. The garb of those accused of lesser crimes, indicated by the collar of sharpened branches.

17f696fbd24l0i0oycdmvglo5nx46n.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
17f696fbd24l0i0oycdmvglo5nx46n.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

17f6987f927l0i0oye2h2pzlit333.name: Greathelm
17f6987f927l0i0oye2h2pzlit333.description: Sturdy greathelm made from iron. Though it is uncomfortably heavy and obstructs the vision of the wearer, it provides considerable damage negation.

17f69481b1fl0i0oyflmw1g4d5g0uo.name: Haligtree Helm
17f69481b1fl0i0oyflmw1g4d5g0uo.description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. An iron helm graced by a crown of unalloyed gold. Increases faith.

17f69a2b719l0i0oyglty948pj2eli.name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
17f69a2b719l0i0oyglty948pj2eli.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence and endurance to the detriment of FP. The crown of Hierodas was granted to scholars who engaged in nomadic study away from the academy.

17f69586beal0i0oykfsnvc4lmbfxi.name: Haligtree Knight Helm
17f69586beal0i0oykfsnvc4lmbfxi.description: Helm worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree. Graced by a crown of unalloyed gold.

17f695912ael0i0oywyyb6br2pm11a.name: High Page Hood
17f695912ael0i0oywyyb6br2pm11a.description: Hood of a page selected for special privilege by the noble they serve.

17f69c478dfl0i0ozgmor9bnppal7.name: Highwayman Hood
17f69c478dfl0i0ozgmor9bnppal7.description: Hideously stained and ragged hood. Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

17f69baaa05l0i0ozkvxs099zu679.name: Imp Head (cat)
17f69baaa05l0i0ozkvxs099zu679.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a cat, it holds trace amounts of feline intelligence.

17f698caf07l0i0ozkyde7or07e6pu.name: Hoslow's Helm
17f698caf07l0i0ozkyde7or07e6pu.description: A twin-tailed silver helm decorated with flowery adornments. Symbol of the head of the head of the revered House of Hoslow.

17f69c1dd2el0i0ozlazmh75f99cng.name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
17f69c1dd2el0i0ozlazmh75f99cng.description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head. Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.

17f698fa609l0i0oznl5zwilfuh1oi.name: Imp Head (fanged)
17f698fa609l0i0oznl5zwilfuh1oi.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a fanged demon, it holds trace amounts of bestial strength.

17f6935bccbl0i0ozqmtalizr9k08s.name: Imp Head (corpse)
17f6935bccbl0i0ozqmtalizr9k08s.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling the visage of a corpse, it holds trace amounts of lingering faith.

17f6989e8dfl0i0ozu9cdyko9cdmka.name: Imp Head (elder)
17f6989e8dfl0i0ozu9cdyko9cdmka.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling an elder, it holds trace amounts of arcane knowledge.

17f69816ef9l0i0ozya05y9ggmskcn.name: Imp Head (long-tongued)
17f69816ef9l0i0ozya05y9ggmskcn.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.

17f69b977bfl0i0p01ggnqcshd4pck.name: Imp Head (wolf)
17f69b977bfl0i0p01ggnqcshd4pck.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a wolf, it holds trace amounts of lupine endurance.

17f69872a1fl0i0p0ro3bhaa3iwqi.name: Incantation Scarab
17f69872a1fl0i0p0ro3bhaa3iwqi.description: Golden scarab worn directly on the head. These scarabs roll clumps of incantations during their labors. Slightly reduces the FP costs of incantations, but increases damage taken. As a scarab approaches death, it abandons its rolled treasure and stretches its wings wide for long journey to its home nest.

17f6968ae5fl0i0p1059ri48kyr8tj.name: Iron Kasa
17f6968ae5fl0i0p1059ri48kyr8tj.description: Iron kasa of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Crafted to imitate the woven straw hats worn in the Land of Reeds.

17f695e0212l0i0p116zi571esihv.name: Iron Helmet
17f695e0212l0i0p116zi571esihv.description: An iron helmet showing rust on its edges. Cloth covering the mouth and neck provides some resistance to poison and other irritants.

17f69a8f345l0i0p12a9jsknocmc3h.name: Jar
17f69a8f345l0i0p12a9jsknocmc3h.description: Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned. Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander. In a uniquely jarlike gesture of friendship, it boosts the power of throwing pot items.

17f698185e9l0i0p13y0n9qjr9fgscp.name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
17f698185e9l0i0p13y0n9qjr9fgscp.description: Cap worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.

17f69a86fa0l0i0p15n2exwbb7imrn.name: Knight Helm
17f69a86fa0l0i0p15n2exwbb7imrn.description: Iron helm of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

17f69b407a5l0i0p18io80r14z66po.name: Land Of Reeds Helm
17f69b407a5l0i0p18io80r14z66po.description: Helm made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to blood-soaked madness, or so it is said.

17f69841f31l0i0p19rg3lex25o0oi.name: Kaiden Helm
17f69841f31l0i0p19rg3lex25o0oi.description: Helm worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.

17f697688d7l0i0p1h96rv7f34xd0b.name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
17f697688d7l0i0p1h96rv7f34xd0b.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

17f6941fde9l0i0p2mko47s97axtui.name: Maliketh's Helm
17f6941fde9l0i0p2mko47s97axtui.description: Beast's helm made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.

17f6931b7c7l0i0p2n8wy9rv3duh8s.name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
17f6931b7c7l0i0p2n8wy9rv3duh8s.description: The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.

17f6982d6d7l0i0p2o2i9yxyofn0mp.name: Leyndell Knight Helm
17f6982d6d7l0i0p2o2i9yxyofn0mp.description: Helm worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.

17f6950e137l0i0p2q9h6f0ocw3c77.name: Lionel's Helm
17f6950e137l0i0p2q9h6f0ocw3c77.description: Round iron helm with a distinctive large brim. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.

17f69570454l0i0p2run60av8ymo9k.name: Malenia's Winged Helm
17f69570454l0i0p2run60av8ymo9k.description: Winged helm made of unalloyed gold.

17f69a7ca14l0i0p2tuxxq38wcosb.name: Malformed Dragon Helm
17f69a7ca14l0i0p2tuxxq38wcosb.description: A malformed golden helm. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.

17f695f6f46l0i0p2ykast2we1aq1l.name: Marais Mask
17f695f6f46l0i0p2ykast2we1aq1l.description: Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais. Increases arcane. The Marais family has a dual history spanning generations, serving as both executioners and castellans of the Shaded Castle. This mask bears the likeness of the first of their line.

17f699e7e02l0i0p30ih3ylhyrbsjl.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
17f699e7e02l0i0p30ih3ylhyrbsjl.description: Cylindrical helm of plate metal reinforced with a lattice. Worm by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.

17f69aa6dfdl0i0p31z2jv5am2erqc.name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
17f69aa6dfdl0i0p31z2jv5am2erqc.description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.

17f69a0d3c3l0i0p3o08ykgd7j2xjh.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
17f69a0d3c3l0i0p3o08ykgd7j2xjh.description: Cylindrical helm of plate metal reinforced with a lattice. Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.

17f699c3b5fl0i0p3o03nj3sdoaw5s.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
17f699c3b5fl0i0p3o03nj3sdoaw5s.description: Metal helm formed in the likeness of the face of a bird.

17f69b92fcal0i0p4cyhqol55tgk9.name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
17f69b92fcal0i0p4cyhqol55tgk9.description: Twin crowns worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City. Indicates the highest clerical rank, and hides the eyes with silk. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f693b0fa9l0i0p4etuldc9puvo8l.name: Mushroom Head
17f693b0fa9l0i0p4etuldc9puvo8l.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the head.

17f6961be1fl0i0p4fhrxrrzn02xnd.name: Night's Cavalry Helm
17f6961be1fl0i0p4fhrxrrzn02xnd.description: Pitch-black helm with flowing black hair. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

17f693b438bl0i0p4gemfom2fp1vb.name: Mask Of Confidence
17f693b438bl0i0p4gemfom2fp1vb.description: Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread. Increases arcane. When Radagon married Rennala, he ordered the Carian magic preceptors to don these masks. To make it clear that all of their matters were to be kept strictly private.

17f69a37531l0i0p4h1p5j95hyj8xd.name: Navy Hood
17f69a37531l0i0p4h1p5j95hyj8xd.description: A hooded cloak of deep navy. Worn by expatriated royalty. Increases mind. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on missions to faraway lands, from which they would never return. But what choice did they have, having seen the guidance of grace?

17f6983c12dl0i0p4r36dunr43mao.name: Night's Cavalry Helm (altered)
17f6983c12dl0i0p4r36dunr43mao.description: Lighter version of the Night's Cavalry Helm.

17f69c41c6al0i0p4u5sk20p43vz1.name: Mushroom Crown
17f69c41c6al0i0p4u5sk20p43vz1.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece. Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot. Long ago, great lords served the scarlet rot. Perhaps such fungal bodies served as their crowns.

17f697ff04el0i0p58ah80eaty1zpl.name: Nox Mirrorhelm
17f697ff04el0i0p58ah80eaty1zpl.description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass. One among the Eternal City's ritual implements. Easily broken and weak against striking attacks. Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.

17f697ae674l0i0p5eukmqyrfgsn7r.name: Nox Monk Hood
17f697ae674l0i0p5eukmqyrfgsn7r.description: Silk hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f6975464el0i0p68mdggqqz1s99w.name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
17f6975464el0i0p68mdggqqz1s99w.description: Cowl made of soft cloth. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

17f69c30df6l0i0p6a19w1ib4p3py.name: Nox Swordstress Crown
17f69c30df6l0i0p6a19w1ib4p3py.description: Crown worn by the swordstresses of the Eternal City. These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and the silk hides their eyes. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f69956005l0i0p6bnh0z0hsvuqfv.name: Okina Mask
17f69956005l0i0p6bnh0z0hsvuqfv.description: A wooden mask that depicts an old man bearing his teeth. The source of the sobriquet of the great swordman of the Land of Reeds. Raises dexterity as it lowers focus.

17f699d92a4l0i0p6e4mw7zbfqkeg.name: Nox Swordstress Crown (altered)
17f699d92a4l0i0p6e4mw7zbfqkeg.description: Lighter version of the Nox Swordstress Crown.

17f695ae069l0i0p6evp28kjw7adz.name: Nox Monk Hood (altered)
17f695ae069l0i0p6evp28kjw7adz.description: Lighter version of the Nox Monk Hood.

17f69324615l0i0p6gt2sref4mirp5.name: Octopus Head
17f69324615l0i0p6gt2sref4mirp5.description: A land octopus whelp worn directly on the head. Has a lingering warmth reminiscent of human skin. Those who can withstand the smell will find its organic elasticity excellent for negating strikes.

17f69a7deael0i0p6hpi51dx2py5hl.name: Omen Helm
17f69a7deael0i0p6hpi51dx2py5hl.description: Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

17f695563b4l0i0p6mlnshe9rhzh9.name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
17f695563b4l0i0p6mlnshe9rhzh9.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence to the detriment of HP. The lineage of the Olivinus Conspectus began with the sorcerer Lusat, and its adherents continue his study of meteors.

17f69377609l0i0p7mo5tsrxhk8fdk.name: Perfumer Hood
17f69377609l0i0p7mo5tsrxhk8fdk.description: Hood of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

17f692dcfb1l0i0p7mw9kqxmqm7c0q.name: Omensmirk Mask
17f692dcfb1l0i0p7mw9kqxmqm7c0q.description: Mask with long, hideously twisted horns worn by the Omenkillers. Increases strength. Bears the smirking face of an elder, twisted in wicked delight. This visage is carved in the image of the evil spirits that haunt the Omen in their nightmares.

17f6990f151l0i0p7tsmtssx1tv9td.name: Preceptor's Big Hat
17f6990f151l0i0p7tsmtssx1tv9td.description: Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.

17f69ba4560l0i0p804lmd51e27ehs.name: Prisoner Iron Mask
17f69ba4560l0i0p804lmd51e27ehs.description: Iron mask forced on a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Thick, heavy, and utterly stifling. A foul creation designed to torment the wearer, either slowly fermenting hatred within their heart, or a spiritual fervor that is near indistinguishable from it.

17f6981d596l0i0p84hfsao6ec1p8.name: Queen's Crescent Crown
17f6981d596l0i0p84hfsao6ec1p8.description: A tall crown depicting the moon. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. Increases intelligence. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

17f698aba13l0i0p87xbw6nlaxenn9.name: Radahn Soldier Helm
17f698aba13l0i0p87xbw6nlaxenn9.description: Helm worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Its visor is fashioned after a lion's fangs.

17f69ad87f2l0i0p87y2m1323df3es.name: Page Hood
17f69ad87f2l0i0p87y2m1323df3es.description: Hood worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. The unassuming sack-like appearance befits their unseen and unknown stature.

17f697a0522l0i0p88qkwigrnfp6v.name: Prophet Blindfold
17f697a0522l0i0p88qkwigrnfp6v.description: Blindfold of exiled prophets who foretold misfortune  and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Why hesitate, if the path leading to the future is clear? Just close your eyes, and walk.

17f693478b3l0i0p8awadxwww5fst8.name: Pumpkin Helm
17f693478b3l0i0p8awadxwww5fst8.description: An oval helmet large enough to cover any head. Very heavy and very hard. Reduces damage from headshots and impacts. The inside of the helm is pitch black, keeping the crazed warrior within from panicking. Perhaps its rather roomy interior also helps alleviate feelings of pressure and claustrophobia.

17f69b7510dl0i0p8bfux9j8o05xg8.name: Radahn's Redmane Helm
17f69b7510dl0i0p8bfux9j8o05xg8.description: Helm of the golden lion, with flowing red hair. Worn by General Radahn.

17f697a6871l0i0p9i0hdjvwr1ebxh.name: Ragged Hat (altered)
17f697a6871l0i0p9i0hdjvwr1ebxh.description: Lighter version of the Ragged Hat.

17f6999d504l0i0p9jkcrfb79ctv7h.name: Radiant Gold Mask
17f6999d504l0i0p9jkcrfb79ctv7h.description: A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo. Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism. Strenthens Golden Order incantations. Its striking design represents both the brilliant inspiration that once shone upon him, and the vision of a ring that he will surely find at the end of his pursuit. "To you who seek to shine as I do, wear it well!"

17f69b3596el0i0p9nbylvjd00fim.name: Ragged Hat
17f69b3596el0i0p9nbylvjd00fim.description: Helm pieced together from scavenged metal.

17f69c1bdafl0i0p9ocg2s870qbrq.name: Raya Lucarian Helm
17f69c1bdafl0i0p9ocg2s870qbrq.description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Its brow adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.

17f698a2880l0i0p9pglobpdndw7xd.name: Rotten Duelist Helm
17f698a2880l0i0p9pglobpdndw7xd.description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

17f695ad3ecl0i0p9tie3fytybrt8b.name: Royal Remains Helm
17f695ad3ecl0i0p9tie3fytybrt8b.description: Helm graced with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

17f695760cfl0i0p9urv4lp8v5mwz.name: Royal Knight Helm
17f695760cfl0i0p9urv4lp8v5mwz.description: Silver helm of Loretta, a Knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.

17f6979b4acl0i0p9who5ky2mnwc4q.name: Redmane Knight Helm
17f6979b4acl0i0p9who5ky2mnwc4q.description: Helm worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.

17f699ab645l0i0p9z4wypaxvz4tl.name: Sacred Crown Helm
17f699ab645l0i0p9z4wypaxvz4tl.description: Flanged iron cap adorned with a crown of unalloyed gold. Increases faith. Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Who is it that Miquella shall bless, if not the low and the meek?

17f697f4960l0i0pa031j1doru2pae.name: Ruler's Mask
17f697f4960l0i0pa031j1doru2pae.description: Mask in the image of a wizened sage. Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation. Increases faith. Such a mask illustrates the qualities of an ideal lord: chiefly, wise and possessing a certain defanged geniality. One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.

17f69b3bb2bl0i0pbejz4fvryrl9w.name: Scaled Helm
17f69b3bb2bl0i0pbejz4fvryrl9w.description: Helm worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.

17f698a3a2al0i0pbibwef45mrw4a8.name: Shining Horned Headband
17f698a3a2al0i0pbibwef45mrw4a8.description: Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.

17f69a73ec9l0i0pbifaqsp4er5n4s.name: Sanguine Noble Hood
17f69a73ec9l0i0pbifaqsp4er5n4s.description: Hood of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.

17f693f6476l0i0pbix8kfz66j4wt.name: Sage Hood
17f693f6476l0i0pbix8kfz66j4wt.description: A burgundy pointed hood. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.

17f6959d0a8l0i0pbk3c7c2xgt23gn.name: Skeletal Mask
17f6959d0a8l0i0pbk3c7c2xgt23gn.description: Skeletal mask that tightly grips the face. Worn by the assassin's of Ravensmount.

17f69397b4el0i0pbkuysa96kby3nk.name: Snow Witch Hat
17f69397b4el0i0pbkuysa96kby3nk.description: Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through. Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery. Strengthens cold sorcery. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

17f69351e86l0i0pbni6j7eg9mlcea.name: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
17f69351e86l0i0pbni6j7eg9mlcea.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

17f6955a164l0i0pbrirpnedg2w1ld.name: Silver Tear Mask
17f6955a164l0i0pbrirpnedg2w1ld.description: Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk. Greatly increases arcane to the detriment of physical attack power. To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.

17f694f0b12l0i0pbxqhdacii1drzh.name: Traveler's Hat
17f694f0b12l0i0pbxqhdacii1drzh.description: Hat of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

17f696f1e7bl0i0pdc7gwd4aptvdb.name: Vulgar Militia Helm
17f696f1e7bl0i0pdc7gwd4aptvdb.description: Helm worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen. The upward extension serves to create an appearance of larger size, however slightly.

17f695a182dl0i0pdc9aqxyoh0h4bl.name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
17f695a182dl0i0pdc9aqxyoh0h4bl.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.

17f693df84bl0i0pddogyqqykhoixl.name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
17f693df84bl0i0pddogyqqykhoixl.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Greatly increases intelligence to the detriment of HP and stamina. Scholars of the Twinsage Conspectus were the elites of the academy, permitted to study and excel in sorceries of all kinds.

17f69a899dfl0i0pddsuefgxanxsmf.name: Veteran's Helm
17f69a899dfl0i0pddsuefgxanxsmf.description: An old helm that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.

17f695fbe3cl0i0pdeuqbgchkcazkl.name: White Mask
17f695fbe3cl0i0pdeuqbgchkcazkl.description: Bloodstained, faintly grinning mask. Worn by war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. The Lord of Blood's curse enlivens the wearer when bloodletting occurs. Slightly raises attack power when there is blood loss nearby.

17f6984cb7el0i0pdetbew8j94o0ra.name: Tree Sentinel Helm
17f6984cb7el0i0pdetbew8j94o0ra.description: Golden helm of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

17f698af2f9l0i0pdfbvbx82n0r47l.name: Twinned Helm
17f698af2f9l0i0pdfbvbx82n0r47l.description: Helm depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

17f698fd2a7l0i0pdfklx6dladeexc.name: Vagabond Knight Helm
17f698fd2a7l0i0pdfklx6dladeexc.description: Helm of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.

17f69466705l0i0pdkl9qzvc1ca9lv.name: Zamor Mask
17f69466705l0i0pdkl9qzvc1ca9lv.description: Mask worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

17f6975004bl0i0pf2ymcptcjn4xmk.name: Astrologer Trousers
17f6975004bl0i0pf2ymcptcjn4xmk.description: Trousers worn inside a robe. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.

17f6939586bl0i0pf342a1vm5kkewl.name: Battlemage Legwraps
17f6939586bl0i0pf342a1vm5kkewl.description: Legwraps worn by the scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

17f6947003bl0i0pf3kslr4ap1hce.name: Aristocrat Boots
17f6947003bl0i0pf3kslr4ap1hce.description: Boots made from tanned leather. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Abandoning their birthplace after the shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

17f6971934fl0i0pf3xzqx2bx77g49.name: Banished Knight Greaves
17f6971934fl0i0pf3xzqx2bx77g49.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. These greaves were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.

17f692d4de3l0i0pf68kg5ine04x3.name: Blackflame Monk Greave
17f692d4de3l0i0pf68kg5ine04x3.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.

17f69be35f5l0i0pf697dz3w77lres.name: Beast Champion Greaves
17f69be35f5l0i0pf697dz3w77lres.description: Silver greaves engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.

17f697e7b70l0i0pf7qlnt28ojl0nh.name: Black Knife Greaves
17f697e7b70l0i0pf7qlnt28ojl0nh.description: Greaves used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

17f698db294l0i0pfbl9pw0tl3d08i.name: Blaidd's Greaves
17f698db294l0i0pfbl9pw0tl3d08i.description: Well-worn black greaves of the man-wolf Blaidd.

17f69692d7dl0i0pgo4addilqmudug.name: Cleanrot Greaves
17f69692d7dl0i0pgo4addilqmudug.description: Greaves of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.

17f69a9a3c2l0i0pgoafeupih2koyi.name: Blue Silver Mail Skirt
17f69a9a3c2l0i0pgoafeupih2koyi.description: Chainmail skirt crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.

17f69372895l0i0pgognb3zh05oyi.name: Briar Greaves
17f69372895l0i0pgognb3zh05oyi.description: Battered iron greaves from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar.

17f6955d1bbl0i0pgoujy78n1z704.name: Brave's Legwraps
17f6955d1bbl0i0pgoujy78n1z704.description: Greaves wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.

17f692f026el0i0pgqn9h69g38vkus.name: Commoner's Shoes
17f692f026el0i0pgqn9h69g38vkus.description: Modest shoes made of cloth. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. Only, there are no commoners remaining with their wits about them.

17f699dacd9l0i0pgr5dfa76ma68sc.name: Carian Knight Greaves
17f699dacd9l0i0pgr5dfa76ma68sc.description: Greaves of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all decorated heroes, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

17f69b52568l0i0pgs8kizirn11qd.name: Cloth Trousers
17f69b52568l0i0pgs8kizirn11qd.description: Trousers made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.

17f697261e6l0i0pgtgsp709nb4xsa.name: Chain Leggings
17f697261e6l0i0pgtgsp709nb4xsa.description: Leggings made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.

17f69b0ad55l0i0pgu633svhfssih.name: Bloodhound Knight Greaves
17f69b0ad55l0i0pgu633svhfssih.description: Metal greaves of the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made the knight stays loyal for life.

17f69387d24l0i0ph15szdiegzloyc.name: Bull-goat Greaves
17f69387d24l0i0ph15szdiegzloyc.description: Great Horned Tragoth's greaves. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise.

17f69aef4b1l0i0phzyvuy1qjp4oel.name: Cuckoo Knight Greaves
17f69aef4b1l0i0phzyvuy1qjp4oel.description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f69549e50l0i0pi11yunxsy375d.name: Crucible Greaves
17f69549e50l0i0pi11yunxsy375d.description: Greaves of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations. In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.

17f698d5444l0i0pi1ulnm1rc5qch.name: Confessor Boots
17f698d5444l0i0pi1ulnm1rc5qch.description: Leather boots of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.

17f698f9c24l0i0pi3v7okod63kwvu.name: Drake Knight Greaves
17f698f9c24l0i0pi3v7okod63kwvu.description: Greaves wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.

17f698f1219l0i0pi4a55qcqe1rcw3.name: Consort's Trousers
17f698f1219l0i0pi4a55qcqe1rcw3.description: Fine white trousers, perfectly suited for wearing beneath a silk robe.

17f6946190el0i0pi558gumllwjgl3.name: Deathbed Smalls
17f6946190el0i0pi558gumllwjgl3.description: Skirt worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion.

17f69b4f744l0i0pi68q3ihx2ageaq.name: Eccentric's Breeches
17f69b4f744l0i0pi68q3ihx2ageaq.description: The knight Jerren's breeches. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.

17f69c55725l0i0pi6oba1dev4bbv9.name: Duelist Greaves
17f69c55725l0i0pi6oba1dev4bbv9.description: Greaves encircles by bronze snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.

17f699c49edl0i0pi88zl49rrgngf.name: Elden Lord Greaves
17f699c49edl0i0pi88zl49rrgngf.description: Greaves of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.

17f699ef203l0i0pis7tqxak4y1zve.name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
17f699ef203l0i0pis7tqxak4y1zve.description: Commonplace leather boots, sturdy enough to withstand a long journey.

17f69622f6cl0i0pjc05js9m9o7wja.name: Fire Prelate Greaves
17f69622f6cl0i0pjc05js9m9o7wja.description: Black iron greaves with the appearance of flames. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.

17f699f81a1l0i0pjcgq6p492zwoh.name: Fur Leggings
17f699f81a1l0i0pjcgq6p492zwoh.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts. Worn by ancestral follower warriors. The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.

17f69508987l0i0pjd92xk2a5xm7lm.name: Fingerprint Greaves
17f69508987l0i0pjd92xk2a5xm7lm.description: Iron greaves singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

17f69a90f49l0i0pjdktrpgmf8dtki.name: Finger Maiden Shoes
17f69a90f49l0i0pjdktrpgmf8dtki.description: Shoes worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.

17f699f6cc4l0i0pje4benasznz9h.name: Exile Greaves
17f699f6cc4l0i0pje4benasznz9h.description: Damaged iron greaves. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.

17f695faf97l0i0pjg6918xct5zqg.name: Foot Soldier Greaves
17f695faf97l0i0pjg6918xct5zqg.description: Metal Graves that have already been mended countless times. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

17f6994cf13l0i0pjgx7fo0ts37s86.name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
17f6994cf13l0i0pjgx7fo0ts37s86.description: Greaves worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f697afca0l0i0pjke1nw6n59j3iy.name: Godrick Knight Greaves
17f697afca0l0i0pjke1nw6n59j3iy.description: Greaves worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f697daf0dl0i0pjmfakgpsp5901d.name: Fire Monk Greaves
17f697daf0dl0i0pjmfakgpsp5901d.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Fire Monks.

17f69403682l0i0pjpag5hfhptfu1v.name: Godrick Soldier Greaves
17f69403682l0i0pjpag5hfhptfu1v.description: Greaves worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f695a1a38l0i0pkr8gy43eps1rb8.name: Gold Waistwrap
17f695a1a38l0i0pkr8gy43eps1rb8.description: Waistwrap made in the image of Erdtree branches. A minimal adornment made by Lord Goldmask's disciples. Those disciples have long since left him.

17f69ba4982l0i0pkrcelbkbzjuebo.name: Haligtree Knight Greaves
17f69ba4982l0i0pkrcelbkbzjuebo.description: Greaves worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f695cd952l0i0pkshargec6vkeul.name: Godskin Apostle Trousers
17f695cd952l0i0pkshargec6vkeul.description: Trousers made by seweing together patches of smooth skin.

17f69870f92l0i0pksini97stvfbt.name: Hoslow's Greaves
17f69870f92l0i0pksini97stvfbt.description: Garish silver greaves decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.

17f69a365f1l0i0pkskdokmb4aqac9.name: Haligtree Greaves
17f69a365f1l0i0pkskdokmb4aqac9.description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f693efe45l0i0pksskfqwqpkblip.name: Godskin Noble Trousers
17f693efe45l0i0pksskfqwqpkblip.description: Trousers made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes them plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

17f692da083l0i0pkub9op7ur2bu7.name: Guardian Greaves
17f692da083l0i0pkub9op7ur2bu7.description: Engraved golden greaves. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.

17f6954422cl0i0pkw3x0jp3fcunxb.name: Knight Greaves
17f6954422cl0i0pkw3x0jp3fcunxb.description: Iron greaves of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

17f69c101efl0i0plwcdy4h7oe06s.name: Leather Boots
17f69c101efl0i0plwcdy4h7oe06s.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather boots worn by a savvy soldier. Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

17f692d6d3fl0i0plykz2nvpwtqx6q.name: Leather Trousers
17f692d6d3fl0i0plykz2nvpwtqx6q.description: Well-made leather trousers. The lower legs are each bound in cord for ease of movement.

17f6942a406l0i0pm0d0tqba0zfhdu.name: Leyndell Knight Greaves
17f6942a406l0i0pm0d0tqba0zfhdu.description: Greaves worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f6941c186l0i0pm1lnb643gzk7eh.name: Leyndell Soldier Greaves
17f6941c186l0i0pm1lnb643gzk7eh.description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f6987f610l0i0pm1vzwigb76cu0m.name: Lionel's Greaves
17f6987f610l0i0pm1vzwigb76cu0m.description: Rounded iron greaves. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.

17f6995b220l0i0pm3i22h6tm82k99.name: Malenia's Greaves
17f6995b220l0i0pm3i22h6tm82k99.description: Greaves made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a godhe is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

17f699a3975l0i0pm54n0l27gvvo5.name: Maliketh's Greaves
17f699a3975l0i0pm54n0l27gvvo5.description: Beast's greaves made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.

17f69a056cfl0i0pm6kq7y9ufxm2t.name: Mausoleum Greaves
17f69a056cfl0i0pm6kq7y9ufxm2t.description: Greaves worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Museum. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f69a4792dl0i0pm6tuxc3efvpc5h.name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
17f69a4792dl0i0pm6tuxc3efvpc5h.description: Greaves worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f69bf199dl0i0pn8qhruxql5jeou.name: Old Sorcerer Legwraps
17f69bf199dl0i0pn8qhruxql5jeou.description: Ragged waistcloth that extends to the thighs. Common amongst old-fashioned sorcerers.

17f69820f0al0i0pnb1d742cf4p6ji.name: Nox Monk Greaves
17f69820f0al0i0pnb1d742cf4p6ji.description: Greaves worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

17f694ccf8bl0i0pnb11z5qi5zvmqri.name: Omenkiller Boots
17f694ccf8bl0i0pnb11z5qi5zvmqri.description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.

17f696781fbl0i0pnb8q58nbh8f7zd.name: Nomadic Merchant's Trousers
17f696781fbl0i0pnb8q58nbh8f7zd.description: Trousers of the nomadic merchants. These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground. Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.

17f699914dal0i0pnbd82h1myfw47k.name: Page Trousers
17f699914dal0i0pnbd82h1myfw47k.description: Trousers worn by pages who serve nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way.

17f69584223l0i0pnc8qfej2bqj2yh.name: Night's Cavalry Greaves
17f69584223l0i0pnc8qfej2bqj2yh.description: Pitch-black greaves thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

17f696ee179l0i0pne15nwa4b5cn9q.name: Mushroom Legs
17f696ee179l0i0pne15nwa4b5cn9q.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the Legs.  To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

17f696699bal0i0pnhqgtwbmow6dsr.name: Omen Greaves
17f696699bal0i0pnhqgtwbmow6dsr.description: Malformed greaves resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

17f69506269l0i0pnj7c4upe39du29.name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
17f69506269l0i0pnj7c4upe39du29.description: Hard-wearing shoes made of leather. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.

17f6951005fl0i0pnljvpplac2f0bg.name: Noble's Trousers
17f6951005fl0i0pnljvpplac2f0bg.description: White trousers of superior craftsmanship. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.

17f696a85bal0i0poje1hl0kjcvy48.name: Ragged Loincloth
17f696a85bal0i0poje1hl0kjcvy48.description: Greaves pieced together from scavenged metal.

17f6948eca0l0i0polm87e0y8owv0q.name: Perfumer Sarong
17f6948eca0l0i0polm87e0y8owv0q.description: Sarong of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

17f695fa838l0i0pomm6s2dvz1m2gv.name: Preceptor's Trousers
17f695fa838l0i0pomm6s2dvz1m2gv.description: Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals. Black and perfectly discreet.

17f6955fad0l0i0pomtthajgj5djj9.name: Prophet Trousers
17f6955fad0l0i0pomtthajgj5djj9.description: Trousers of the exiled prophets who foresaw that their faith would end in flames  and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Its fabric scrapes against their skin like a file, and the rickety cart wheel around the neck warns passers-by not to lend an ear to their meandering sermons.

17f69467bb4l0i0pon23cmftuh3stj.name: Queen's Leggings
17f69467bb4l0i0pon23cmftuh3stj.description: Leggings indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

17f695916ael0i0poomo5zw8rgcb.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
17f695916ael0i0poomo5zw8rgcb.description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f69734256l0i0pop4lrxhhalyism.name: Prisoner Trousers
17f69734256l0i0pop4lrxhhalyism.description: Tattered trousers. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy. The smell is beyond belief.

17f69bee0bel0i0pos47sjb9zulkdo.name: Redmane Knight Greaves
17f69bee0bel0i0pos47sjb9zulkdo.description: Black iron greaves worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.

17f697c5049l0i0pox3ll9j2a4c9j.name: Radahn's Greaves
17f697c5049l0i0pox3ll9j2a4c9j.description: Greaves depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn.

17f694275f3l0i0poxfwbsjqcjmsq.name: Radahn Soldier Greaves
17f694275f3l0i0poxfwbsjqcjmsq.description: Greaves worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

17f6953773bl0i0pptul3bp3wpgwpm.name: Royal Knight Greaves
17f6953773bl0i0pptul3bp3wpgwpm.description: Silver greaves of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

17f69926916l0i0ppuay8pv5dyeuhm.name: Ronin's Greaves
17f69926916l0i0ppuay8pv5dyeuhm.description: Greaves of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn.

17f6968ce06l0i0ppwtihb11ddohl.name: Royal Remains Greaves
17f6968ce06l0i0ppwtihb11ddohl.description: Greaves graced with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

17f69338194l0i0ppyr6tos8ohwj6f.name: Sage Trousers
17f69338194l0i0ppyr6tos8ohwj6f.description: Thick burgundy trousers. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.

17f69335b9cl0i0pq12v7srw2r2bo.name: Shaman Leggings
17f69335b9cl0i0pq12v7srw2r2bo.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.

17f698e65e9l0i0pq2pl5205ajnfq8.name: Snow Witch Skirt
17f698e65e9l0i0pq2pl5205ajnfq8.description: Witch's skirt in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

17f696addc9l0i0pq2z3pa3ns5r3n8.name: Scaled Greaves
17f696addc9l0i0pq2z3pa3ns5r3n8.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks. Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.

17f694aee12l0i0pq3r741go0agkve.name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
17f694aee12l0i0pq3r741go0agkve.description: Greaves wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

17f695f474el0i0pq4ahf7oqqv96qc.name: Spellblade's Trousers
17f695f474el0i0pq4ahf7oqqv96qc.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

17f6937579el0i0pq4dn4l0mcnf8of.name: Sorcerer Leggings
17f6937579el0i0pq4dn4l0mcnf8of.description: Leggings worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the legs.

17f69542e8fl0i0pr2zy2b4ue7gwb.name: Traveler's Slops
17f69542e8fl0i0pr2zy2b4ue7gwb.description: Slops of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

17f6945e6ael0i0pr623lqn3c1udgz.name: Veteran's Greaves
17f6945e6ael0i0pr623lqn3c1udgz.description: An old greaves that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.

17f69359c78l0i0pr7xhn2h4bop5rd.name: Twinned Greaves
17f69359c78l0i0pr7xhn2h4bop5rd.description: Greaves depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

17f6983e0c4l0i0pr8jcvho8sjpyrv.name: Tree Sentinel Greaves
17f6983e0c4l0i0pr8jcvho8sjpyrv.description: Golden greaves of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

17f6999dba9l0i0pr9eapst72vk1pi.name: War Surgeon Trousers
17f6999dba9l0i0pr9eapst72vk1pi.description: Bloodstained trousers of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varr, that is; though he was an exception

17f69a73942l0i0pr9fp2dqvcuso7j.name: Vulgar Militia Greaves
17f69a73942l0i0pr9fp2dqvcuso7j.description: Greaves worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.

17f69b331cdl0i0prazfpca0hkqnwd.name: Warrior Greaves
17f69b331cdl0i0prazfpca0hkqnwd.description: Greaves of a nomadic warrior. Crafted from sturdy leather.

17f69605a57l0i0prb6fehlfp6ir4g.name: Vagabond Knight Greaves
17f69605a57l0i0prb6fehlfp6ir4g.description: Greaves of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.

17f69593610l0i0prq4f20zg6h5g1w.name: White Reed Greaves
17f69593610l0i0prq4f20zg6h5g1w.description: Greaves of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.

17f695e6e41l0i0prslappmip8fo8i.name: Zamor Legwraps
17f695e6e41l0i0prslappmip8fo8i.description: Legwraps worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
